title: 强AI机器人 建立乌托邦的奴隶？
author: UTzhushou
content: Strong AI robot slaves to build utopia? Original 2016-08-04 old assistant and UT UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA facilitate the public's number is more college students a vision seen "I, Robot," the people will remember the movie depicted human society . It was a robot AI (artificial intelligence) era of highly developed, the robot just like the iPhone has become all consumer goods. They are like servants to obey, they will not let them east to west, they do not want to do all things human to human. Robotics and AI in scientific and technological power of the 21st century was the development, we can imagine such a reality in the near future. We might come before it, think about how will this world's problems, what kind of contradiction. What kind of things to do robot robot has been in existence for many years, they have been around us for our service. Robot meaning of existence there are two: 1, for us to do what we can not do (example: the production of heavy machine) 2, for us to do what we want to do something (for example: a bomb disposal robot) The first meaning no need to repeat we now can not do and will not do. Our evolutionary necessity to keep up with the pace of technological development. And in the future, we need high strength and power engineering, and complex high-speed operation can only be done by a robot go in now, which do not need to tangle. The second meaning is that I believe that robots are very worthy of discussion. What specifically is "we do not want to do" something? It seems that we can find some examples, but can not give an accurate definition. Labor, housework, overtime, these looks are what we do not want to do. But this is the absolute right? These things from inherently annoying you? Not really. "Like", "dislike" is relative. You may feel that learning is painful, but the poor people anxious to take the classroom every day a child (elementary school teacher years old stems). We do not like things only with our favorite things compared, it is not to be liked. Unlimited human desire, we can always find one we prefer to do. From this theory we seem to be derived from a terrible truth: all in all, is a potential we do not want to do. Based on this premise, we can conclude: we need the robot to do, we will be closer to all the things we do. Precisely because of this, it is easy to see the future of human society will be extremely or completely dependent on robots, what we now take for granted, the future will be the wait to throw our robot slaves "grind." Mary Ann Warren: Man or personality? So whether the robot into a slave morality, will become the focus of a discussion. To solve this problem, we only need to answer "Robot count people." This "man" If the physiological significance of the "people", and that is certainly not a robot. But on the other hand, daily contact with people we really treat the physiological significance of the "people" do. If one day Hawking body completely decay, and his brain was transferred to a culture vessel, and continue the dialogue with us through sophisticated equipment, we still give him all he enjoyed respect and human rights. So we really need to ask is whether the robot will have personality. For personality, modern philosophers Warren gives five characteristics, if have, then this entity can be described as "personality": 1: Consciousness (the surrounding environment can react) 2: the ability to think 3 : independent activity 4: ability to communicate 5: consciousness (the "I" concept) can say that the robot has more than five traits just a technical problem, will one day happen. Warren's list suggests that "people" are not necessarily innate, can be acquired artificial. And when we really have to make a personal machine "person" Why should we not given him our equal human rights? When the machine "who" have a personality and human rights, we can take for granted that they will be treated as slaves? This will become a major bottleneck in the development of AI. For now, the robot has been done, 2, 3, and 4 of the item, item 5 is a problem. First, the philosophy of the "consciousness" is defined as self-examination, and may be different from the surrounding environment and the ability to see themselves as agents. Xiao Bian is to learn philosophy, AI do not know how far from this step. But if it that day comes, we will be stronger AI robots as slaves beck and call is undeniable that the amoral. Under the premise of strong AI Personality = human personality, to enter AI "human services," the instruction will be a brainwashed, and He will never serve someone, in essence, there is a difference? AI development dilemma to break this dilemma is not no way. First, we can deny Warren list, we can argue that the only inherent personality can not be manufactured after tomorrow. It assumed that such rebuttal established Well, this still does not solve any problems. Frightening fact is that strong AI has five qualities Warren on the list, we will be unable to distinguish between AI and people. Examples :( machinery Ji) philosophy famous thought experiment "Chinese Room" pointed out the problem. Suppose that a foreigner was locked in a room, which in addition to an English dictionary nothing. When someone outside progressive Chinese note to communicate with him, he can look outside the Chinese dictionary and communicate without problems, and outside Chinese people will never know whether in the end the people inside really understand Chinese. If we can not distinguish between AI and human, then we get the inevitable conclusion, strong AI = people. So far, AI development has encountered a matter of life and death dilemma. Either stagnant or AI will be developed to the extreme, the development of the human personality goes. After strong AI = robots, they also must have the equal human rights of people, and we need them to do the things we do not want to do, they have the right to say "I do not want to do." AI engineers lifelong effort devoted to the manufacture of the highest state of AI, and then they can be successful manufacturing mankind. Ironically, they celebrate success, to forget our ancestors do the same thing has been done 200, 000 years. title: 【Geoffrey Hinton】We are now the lunatic core
author: UTzhushou
content: [Geoffrey Hinton] We are now the lunatic core original 2016-03-12F assistant Fang Fang UT UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA facilitate the public's number is more college students he has multiple identities, both computer scientists and is considered known psychologist. Google | Distinctive ResearcherUniversity of Toronto | Distinguished Emeritus Professor He has a sparkling experience. University of Cambridge | Experimental Psychology BA University of Edinburgh | PhD University of Sussex | honorary doctorate from University of Edinburgh | honorary doctorate from University of Sherbrooke | honorary doctorate has worked at University of Sussex, University of California San Diego, University of Cambridge, Carnegie Mellon University, University College London ... and won a number of awards 1998 | become a member of the Royal Society 2001 | first prize in the field of cognitive science David E. Rumelhart Prize2005 | international joint Conference on artificial Intelligence distinguished Research lifetime Achievement Awards 2010 | Herzberg Canada Gold Medal for Science and Engineering2012 | Killam prize in engineering2016 | US engineering community the highest academic body National Academy of Engineering expatriate members "cognitive Psychology", "computer science", "Google" - to hear these key word, you guessed Geoffrey Hinton research area yet? Yes, it is Artificial Intelligence. The focus of his research is the artificial neural network (Artificial Neural Network). Artificial neural network computing model based on artificial neural networks are inspired by biological neural networks born, its operation mode is different from the logic reasoning calculus. Artificial neural network contains a large number of artificial neurons (nodes), each node has a specific output function (activation function). Connections between nodes like memory, association between two nodes is called a weight (weight). Because each network will output node, the node function and weight varies. Neuroscience students must understand it is not difficult to find a correspondence between Artificial Neural Networks and our nervous system. Artificial neural networks are often optimized by a statistical point of learning, which belongs to one of the machine learning method. - Origin - Over fifty years ago, when Hinton was a high school student when his friends told him this description: the human brain as holographic projection, memories are not stored in the brain of a point, and It is dispersed among the interleaving of neurons from the information network. Probably no one would have thought that just such a chat, but it became ignited Hinton entire scientific career fire. The human brain works with enthusiasm, Hinton in Cambridge and Edinburgh universities to complete their studies. The early 1980's, he has been involved in the young initiated by a computer hardware and software to mimic the human brain jihad. In this area, which we call deep learning (deep learning). Depth study depth study is a branch of machine learning, which is characterized by a high degree of data abstraction through a multi-level process, in 2007, under the Geoffrey Hinton and Ruslan Salakhutdinov impetus has been widespread concern. Now deep learning in computer vision, speech recognition, language processing has been excellent application. - Edge - in Hinton began deep learning research, the running speed of the computer is far less than today. Deep learning research tied hardware conditions at the time received only very limited success, so that the scientific community in this area has been marginalized for a full thirty years. AI community to focus on the quest into the human brain similar behavior shortcuts, few scientists like Hinton, like trying to restore the nervous system through a computer. Study Hinton and several other scientists back-propagation algorithm once briefly cause a Neuroscience Network "Renaissance", but interest in it was slowly extinguished. Then until 2004, Hinton published about twenty years back-propagation algorithm, Deep learning still get it deserves attention. Back propagation algorithm (Backpropagation) back-propagation algorithm is an artificial intelligence algorithm to train normally with optimization. Simply put, the purpose of back-propagation algorithm is to find the best match the output and input in a wide range of networks. Unlike simple monolayer of artificial neural systems of different (one input corresponding to one output), multilayer back-propagation algorithm can help the nervous system associated with the input of an abstract concept, which is a linear relationship is differentiation. This algorithm can be described Hinton seeds on artificial intelligence research. - Core - but in this year, Hinton rely on small amounts of money to support Canadian Institute for Advanced Research and other scientists established Neural Computation and Adaptive Perception program. Hinton handpicked members, set up a sophisticated research team composed of scientists, and ultimately change the AI ​​community views on Artificial Neural Network. They studied artificial intelligence network with independent study of nature, without human elements add tags to achieve the learning process, which is called unsupervised learning (unsurpervised learning). A few years later, their achievements starting to get the attention of Internet giants, Google, Baidu, Microsoft, Facebook and so began the development of related products, Deep learning finally became mainstream. "We ceased to be the lunatic fringe We're now the lunatic core.." - Geoffrey Hinton now, I am afraid that few people have not heard about voice recognition and face recognition. When you say the command at the mobile phone, and it's like a living as an assistant to complete the character you want, please do not forget to Geoffrey Hinton and his research partners. - Their Stories - Tang Zhong Xian is known to most people is probably because of this Terrier: his son, his brother, his father and even his mother is his nephew the emperor. Geoffrey Hinton is also a number of family members contribute visible. His great-grandfather was the famous British mathematician and philosopher George Boole, the mathematical logic can be described as a pioneer of today's computer science foundation. Another of his great, great grandfather was a surgeon and author James Hinton. James Hinton's son Charles Howard Hinton was a mathematician main four-dimensional space, it is the author of science fiction Scientific Romance. Geoffrey's father, Howard E. Hinton is a profound entomologist, Howard's cousin Joan Hinton is a nuclear physicist, is unique in several Los Alamos National Laboratory (US "Manhattan Project" in the design of nuclear weapons one female laboratory) work, she later moved to Beijing China and lived a life of farmers. Joan's brother William Hinton is a sociologist, was the author of works related to the Cultural Revolution. ...... You see here Hinton is a screen full of brush dizzy? Xiao Bian here did not even include all celebrities Hinton family, interested students at your own wiki feel its powerful gene. - Broken language -Geoffrey deep learning Hinton Battle hit for decades, people are in a half, is the moment in science. This few decades, numerous talented and hard as he usually coexist AI scientists will continue to develop to a new height. Decades later, when you and I are old time, AI, how will? For future possibilities, we also look forward to tremble. We are now the lunatic core. Chase was crazy, road is hard, but the end is also unknown, but we can not stop, probably this is the power of science to it. content: University of Toronto assistant 2015-08-08UT payment perfect Raiders assistant UT UT assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's multi-university students to facilitate public article number UTFAQ much Raiders partner UClass kindly provided by ADA cooperation community, belongs to original author . This article is reproduced with permission by the author, we would like to acknowledge the support and cooperation of UTFAQ with UClass. How much do I need to pay tuition? In 2015, after much ROSI has a new ACORN, ACORN and so ROSI can be found in how much they need to pay tuition. >> Use ROSI See tuition after landing you can see a familiar page, but this time more than a red numbers. (Pictured above) the red numbers that you need to pay the total number, which means you owe the school money. >> See tuition using ACORN (click on the left after landing the financial account will be able to see this page you ~) we point into the Invoice, you can see a detailed list, which lists what you need to pay the cost of computing is how out. (See below) would like to know what those costs represent Well? Look down! How to understand Invoice in specific content? Invoice in various fees See UT represents what the official website of SIS latest update: Guide To Invoice 2015, 2015-16 FW (http://www.fees.utoronto.ca/AssetFactory.aspx?did=1287) front payment required pay attention to what? How can I see my minimum payment? Account # is your last name (Last Name) plus the first five letters of your 10-digit student number. If your 9-digit student number is, it will add a zero (0) in front of your student number that we will use the money to pay back a total of Invoice Amt what you need to pay. Minimum Payment to the bottom of the Register in the invoice and choose view invoice after you can see in Figure. You need before your deadline to pay 65% ​​of total costs to complete the registration. In other words, the school allows you to pay a fee of 65% of the total, and the remaining 35% just this year November 15 to pay. Otherwise, the school will charge a fee of 1.5% per month (month of the annual interest rate equal to 19.6%), it is tantamount to the interest. Even so, you also need until April 30 next year to account all fees paid inside. The following is the deadline for each campus, each department respectively Minimum Payment to Register of Deadlines time (2015-2016 school year) For more details, please poke: http: //www.fees.utoronto.ca/Assets/Student+Accounts + Digital + Assets / 2015 + 2016 + Fall + Winter / minimum_payment.pdf how payment within Canada? As long as your bank account at the following bank, you can use the following three methods to pay tuition: Bank of Montreal (BMO) Royal Bank of Canada (RBC) ScotiabankCanadian Imperial Bank of Commerce (CIBC) TD Canada TrustHSBC Bank CanadaMost credit unions (large partial credit cooperatives) (personal use is not recommended) Note: no matter which method you use, generally need 3-5 business days to appear on ROSI above. If more than seven days and had not seen ROSI / ACORN has been displayed, you can contact the bank and tell them the confirmation number, see if it is where the problem occurs. Method One: foreground payment to the bank (Teller) above the Invoice print out a list of ROSI away from your home to find a relatively close, or you often go to the bank to find a front face amiable sister or brother. . Tell them you want to give the University of Toronto Invoice payments to them, and tell them your Student # and Account # (these two things can be found in the top right corner of the invoice) when they deal with and talk to them in life . . When they finished with the confirmation number or receipt Grab DONE Method 2: Use telephone banking service (Telephone Banking) pick up the phone, dial-up and tell them you give the University of Toronto told them pay your Student # and Account # (both something can be found in the upper right corner of the invoice) to record the confirmation number say gentle thank you, hang up DONE method 3: use Internet banking services (online banking) highlights! PS: This is just say some of the more common methods of operation, in fact, almost every online banking, similar. (UTFAQ team has experience with HSBC, TD, BMO, RBC online banking, universal.) Log in to your online banking found Payment Add Payee generally can choose to search, you can enter the University of Toronto and then will let you enter the Payee Account, account is your Invoice # shown above will be displayed this time you can choose to add the next word success Payee pay this Payee like you want to pay and the cost of inputs, and to set when and from which account to after the final confirmation, you will get a confirmation number down DONE image Raiders: in this selected BMO as a model, but no matter what bank account no Canadian operations are similar, how payment in China? Method One: conduct charge (bill) to C $ Bank Draft or Money Order (payee write University of Toronto) and your Student #, Account # by courier to the address below by CDN Bank Draft or Money Order: Student Accounts 215 Huron Street, 3rd floor, Toronto, Ontario Canada M5S 1A2 send when we must attach your Invoice (printed) or provide your name and student number (if you can write your professional incidentally) Notice: this method there is a drawback is that if the money order sent is lost, then the money within a year can not be frozen for use. Method Two: payment (Western Union) to open the following PDF document link (over some transient above considerations) http://www.fees.utoronto.ca/Assets/Student+Accounts+Digital+Assets/Student_Accounts via Western Union Bank /western_union_business_solutions.pdf at the bottom of the document there is a linking point in, jump to WU. Point [NEXT] Choose your pull-down menu, enter your student number name, etc. amount after the information point NEXT to enter you have to pay (CDN) after going to pay for tuition currencies (domestic banks find CNY) after the point [ after NEXT to enter the payer (payer) information dots [NEXT] and so you read a good information and terms immediately fill out after checking the [Yes, I have read ...] [SUBMIT >>] and then point to the new page, and if no pop up a new window in [IMPORTANT!] [click on the following this link to open it in a new window] is a PDF file to save it. title: 多大明日罢工，四万刀学费去哪了
author: 功能介绍
content: How to strike tomorrow, and forty thousand knife tuition go up 2015-02-27FeanorUT assistant UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's multi-university students to facilitate public No. 4:02 afternoon of February 26, members of the CUPE3902 in Simcoe Hall demonstrations before local Marxist organization fightback in stall selling club bulletin and two guards waited at the front of the school staff about how the upcoming strike rumors have been swirling for weeks, while Friday is the date of the trade union decided to strike. This afternoon, CUPE3902 some members gathered in the principal's office where much of Simcoe Hall were demonstrations. Organizers of the march in front of Simcoe Hall delivered a speech, the content of the reference to "we should not let someone else pay ancestry financial crisis '' of union members to bear half of how much teaching, how much revenue accounted for only 8% of the annual budget", etc. Wait. "Let those who drove luxury cars, wearing expensive suits gentlemen look, we have hip hop music to help us field." Union invited the band was playing, lyrics intermingled with "Professor at the University of slaves", "managers have like angel Solon. " After the parade along the king's College Circle Line all the way to the Ontario legislature. The main trade union demands include job stability, tuition fees, research funding and class size. CUPE 3902 Unit1 members mainly Teaching Assistant at the University of Toronto, the union will make a similar request to reduce tuition fees and the like is not surprising. Fightback union demands that the obstacle facing the government and the central government that the declining investment in higher education. How also claimed to accept union demands means the Ontario Liberal Party in violation of the Government's net-zeromandate. Net-zero Mandate is public sector funded salary negotiation principles proposed by Governor of Ontario. In simple terms, the government will include university workers, nurses, teachers, LCBO and other public sector workers were wage freeze. If employees who receive any income increase, and that it must come from lifting a means of reducing occupational welfare, pensions, layoffs or the like. February 26 is the last date of negotiations the two sides agreed. It now appears that the strike is inevitable. Parties to view EasyFour published commentaries on current affairs criticism union brazen. TA obtain higher wages will inevitably lead to rising tuition, holding a knife 42 hourly TA are insatiable, how much the quality of teaching undergraduate disappointing. Supporters of union decline in the quality of teaching is considered to be due to the TA are much too heavy teaching load. How much of the course too big proportion of students per class TA are very poor, in addition to the clear surface that TA hours per week wages but also put a lot of extra effort curriculum support. How stingy to hire more TA is the root of the problem. Silhouette circle of friends, "Let the workers have the power! Ah hey" "strike comes rural non-mainstream music background", "TA 220 exam strike also as usual" Editor's graduate students are also human beings, and how much TA fifteen thousand annual salary of less than Canada does poverty line. Limited time because of work, and the TA lot of time and effort must be put into research and unpaid work. In fact, the North American academic community workers working environment indeed continued to deteriorate, to join the academic PhD finally able to get tenure not one in ten. Imagine if graduate earnings environment has not improved, there will be willing to sacrifice precious youth six or seven years to study for a degree? So how should we expect it to continue to progress human knowledge in various fields? CUPE3902 initiated the strike could for most of us is a detrimental and bitter. Think, however, those who are willing to pursue a vast choice of low-income students academic career, and perhaps worthy of a support. title: Political Control | 用民族主义圈地自萌
author: UTzhushou
content: Political Control | enclosure with nationalism and self-Meng original 2016-08-20 old assistant UT UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA facilitate public's number of self-improvement as more students, this is a person, a nation or even conduct fundamental. But the "self-reliance" sometimes give the world a devastating blow, which is why? This is nationalism dominated by hatred. When nationalism as wounding razor historical similarity 1918 Seventy years ago, a once owned the whole of Europe with the military and national power comparable to the nation, now only cede territory in humiliation after the defeat, reparations. A politician in front of the crowd at the moment of publication of impassioned speeches. He will spearhead the powers, accusing their insolence and greed led to the decline of their country. Now this nation to stand up, to recapture lost, but also more. He lit a long deep nationalism, he triggered the Second World War became the largest in the history of human slaughter. This person is called Adolf Hitler. Germany after the defeat of Germany after World War I World War failed to withstand the 132 billion marks (330 million dollars) huge war reparations, inflation, and high-speed change three times a day. Like Nietzsche said, people do not hate suffering, disgust is unnecessary suffering. Germans feel that they have suffered a great wrong, after all, a tango, a German war not want a fight. In this historical background, the hearts of the German people filled with hate, just waiting for someone to ignite. After Hitler came to power, out of control, driven German national priorities, as well as anti-Semitic anti-Gypsy policy. The German was an urgent need to rehabilitate someone out for them, and find out the cause of their suffering is now the culprit. Hate to unite a nation of the most efficient means, so under the guidance of Adolf Hitler, the entire German nation began the persecution of the Jews. First, a large number of Jews were deported out of Germany, but this does not match with the German occupation of foreign territory desperately policy because expulsion will immediately be designated to be in their own territory. No other way, only the system of slaughter. How easy it is to all his problems point to a both abstract and figurative "Jew" on. No need to consider further, just know that they are sinners, for various historical reasons we are going to resist, destroy them all. The persecution is called Holocaust (Greek meaning "full burn"), led to the six million Jews were killed, almost half of the world's Jewish population at the time. Today, the massacre are still not washed away the remains. 2013 when Xiao Bian visited Auschwitz, which has seen two large reservoirs, do not look as white, which is why I asked the tour guide replied: That is ashes. Today nationalism 2016 there was a talk show host tells been famously nationalism will only make you as something you never even knew some of the people are not proud of their achievements, as well as hatred. Yes ah, let hatred of a people forget that he's starving, forget that he is the leader of a dictator, and even forget that he sit on the sidelines in an ancient no massacre. Hitler then hatred pattern today is still built in, even on our side. Since the end of 2015, US business people Donald Trump alone, "the supremacy of the United States" remarks, all the way to break the hurdles will be, eventually won the Republican presidential nomination. Many people are asking, how he got here? Actually very simple, we need to look at recent American history. In the decades after World War II, the country urgently needed to boost the productivity of the economy. That is if you are a white man, and not stupid not disabled, will be able to find a job, and could live a good time, at least a car a house and a wife. Such a state until the 1960s. Affirmative action broke the American with a wide range of potential naked white supremacist system. After the era of Martin Luther King, blacks and other minorities get a variety of compensation. A social resources are limited, when a group of people get a little more, another part will naturally get less. Precisely because of this, compared with more opportunities and resources continue to be the minority whites had traditional strengths slowly disappeared. An accounting job had two whites competition, there are two white two black, and one Asian competition together. In this way, those family was not particularly favorable, education is not high on the white felt robbed by the unfair treatment. Trump took advantage of the lower middle class American whites this psychology. He told them that in fact, you have been owed, you present all the others are immigrants took. Once quiet and peaceful Muslims have been broken. These poor whites has always wanted to say someone finally said it. Ah, all those alien wrong, as long as they have a good day we'll be knocked off. This is the Trump portrayed utopia. Although funny, even though logic is not fluent, he indeed touched the white American nationalism which with nerves. 2016 Nationalism positive energy nationalism is not inherently evil. One's own country have deep feelings nothing wrong, after all, people need to find a sense of belonging to animals. A Chinese man wherever he will be holding chopsticks to eat a bowl of white rice, which is a cultural gene, no one could get to go too. But love does not mean to deny their own nation to other nations. Not your death is my death the era we have been behind them. The international community needs of the 21st century is not abuse and exclusive needed is calm thinking and rational debate. Mahatma Gandhi led India in the 20th century independence movement is an excellent example of positive nationalism. After hundreds of years of alien colonization after Gandhi advocated not fierce resistance, but moderate non-violent, non-cooperation. No matter how the British colonists Jifengzhouyu like to suppress the movement, Gandhi always greeted with a smile. This is not only the ultimate political campaign was a success, Gandhi's "non-violent, non-cooperation" has become a worldwide symbol of peaceful protest. Some people say while watching the Olympics this joke: ". America really take advantage of what race they have a" This is an inclusive force. Inclusiveness is not just tolerated, more mining house long, perfect their incomplete. Conclusion positive nationalism does not mean to let others trample their own, but instead sought to achieve self-reliance in the premise of respecting other peoples. In Olympic competition, she won the gold medal for my country I will cheer your country won the gold medal I will be happy for you. After all, what is "national"? Not that the gang take a few pencil box do? title: 【寻味】Winterlicious: A History
author: UTzhushou
content: [] Ruminate Winterlicious: A History Original 2015-12-29Ms.FUT assistant UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA facilitate the public's number is more than 2003 college students to save the off-season it was 12 years ago in Toronto, evil wind and heavy snow blocked Long live the people go with the desire to eat, the whole city was shrouded in a touch of melancholy atmosphere. Like winter after New Year's respect is so quiet, no need to celebrate, only the arrival of spring in the foreseeable future to look forward to. Toronto already accustomed to this routine, every year is not to endure the cold after a while it? However, for a certain group of people, this type of depression brings more pain - restaurant owners against poor turnover frequently frown: "You do not come to eat, I eat what you want?" So in order to save the off-season, Toronto Special Events Office call 35 restaurants together launched a food festival project, the official version is called "to showcase Toronto's diverse and unique fine dining restaurants". Translates to "What? You do not eat too cold in winter? I'll give you cheap packages you coming?" This marketing tool, we now call "buy." You should also remember that in 2003, SARS has just began to subside, although far less than the Chinese Canadian epidemic seriously, but enough to cause SARS impact on its tourism. So planning Food Festival and as part of the recovery of the tourism industry in Toronto has been a greater government support. Summerlicious and Winterlicious two annual food festival so fire up, and continue to grow and develop continues to this day. (Photo courtesy of Il Fornello) 2009 in addition to the definition of the new specification originated in 2003, another important food festival history was 2009, the year. Prior to 2009, the restaurant food festival participation is based on a third party and Customer Evaluation and Review (the so-called public comment) to decide, from 2009 onwards, will participate in the Food Festival restaurant filing, and the staff of the Special Events Department the good number of rigid selection criteria in accordance with regulations. This process is somewhat similar to students applying to university, it was mentioned on the network in 2009, the restaurant selection has taken a vague invitation only, presumably still a subjective component. Nevertheless, in this year, participation winterlicious restaurant has expanded to more than 150. (Screenshot from the City of Toronto official website) praise and controversy exist undeniable, Winterlicious and Summerlicious two food festival is indeed a great success. In the food and beverage industry should be the most depressed time, the major effort will reach the restaurant but usually twice as City of Toronto wish that this project can bring economic benefits, but also make food culture in Toronto to get publicity. For the majority of the goods to eat it, licious is a great opportunity to enjoy fresh food, usually too expensive restaurants within two weeks of the offer price affordable 3 course fixed price menu, popular restaurant in the open booking first full day is also not surprising things. (The picture shows the most popular restaurants Canoe Winterlicious Chef John Horne), however the saying goes, there must be a black powder, Winterlicious and Summerlicious very successful in many ways, but this is a lot of activity in the face of controversy. Licious not able to participate in the activities of the restaurant complained that his own post was hit by so many government tax take to promote their competitors, participate in the activities of the restaurant will face double the usual operating pressure, and in order to reduce some of the costs have to weight and quality to make certain sacrifices that many restaurant waiter said his workload doubled during licious, not even half the usual appreciation and gratitude are not. Customers also complained that some services are not in place, the food is not as good as daily, overpriced drinks and other issues. Meanwhile, Winterlicious many restaurants are relatively high-end restaurant, weekdays diners are more elegant manner, there will be some customers are not used during the winterlicious not comply with dining etiquette, more or less affect the dining experience of other customers. Criticism of Ye Hao, Ye Hao look, winterlicious 2016 in the eye closer and closer. This year's number of restaurants expanded to two hundred, of which only one is clearly divided into Chinese food restaurant for 15 years to join Paul Food Festival Luckee mind, chef Susur Lee will combine traditional Chinese and French cuisine, the pursuit of innovation and tradition coexist Cooking aesthetics. North American restaurant exists more or less westernized and more advanced southern cuisine restaurant in general to the main, Luckee no exception. Xiao Bian as Northerners do not expect to find much taste of home in this restaurant, but I hope to represent Chinese Luckee its outstanding performance in the Winterlicious. (The figure from Luckee official website) So what to eat this year? History will stop here, let's look at the highly anticipated crowd together several restaurants. (Tracy did not personally tasted the restaurant, the restaurant is based on the following google, yelp, tripadvisor and other sites score Featured out for your reference) Canoe [Canadian] that no parts winterlicious list ignores Canoe, located in the TD tower 54 layer, belonging to Oliver and Bonacini food empire. Bannock [Canadian] (2014 winterlicious Bannock Pictured on the main meal of pork and chips) is still Oliver and Bonacini's restaurant, the price is a lot more than Canoe People belonging to lunch 18 dinner package 25 grades, the main Canadian comfort food. Rosewater [Modern] an elegant and romantic restaurant cuisine belongs to contemporary, from the view menu is a fusion of different national dishes. Insomnia [comfort food] Insomnia cuisine as comfort food (homemade food), the price is most close to the people of a file, but the score is much higher than a lot of fine dining restaurants. Brunch Lunch recipe biased in favor of style, dinner recipes is Hamburg, Shepherd's pie, fried chicken category. Michael's on Simcoe [Italian; Steakhouse] steakhouse with a little Italian style, the price is high only 45 dinner knives, but for meat animals is still a very good choice. Pukka [Indian] known as the Toronto-wide best Indian food on the menu you can see the classic butter chicken, vegetable curry and so on. Momofuku Daisho & Momofuku noodle bar [Asian] Momofuku not the traditional meal of the day, but there are some American style in Japan and South Korea mash. Daisho higher price, lower-priced noodle bar. Although they are called Noodle bar noodle bar, but made light of the comments it seems that this store is the best ramen meals outside (such as pork bun). Search & Book Give a man a fish than giving the fishing, the next small series will teach you the way to find a restaurant. of Toronto on the official website can find information about all restaurants in the City, Google search Winterlicious point into the first link on it. Enter the official website you will see the following interface. Select Sort and Share options can be carried out based on price, cuisine, address and other information filtering, on the whole less Asian Restaurant, North America and European accounting for a larger proportion: click through the link you can see the restaurant's specific profile, address, contact information, and most importantly Menu :( suggest that you later found to be interested in Google's restaurant and then evaluate what this restaurant.) the restaurant from January 14 started to accept reservations, although reservation is not required, but the best restaurant As just mentioned Canoe series are no slow hand, are not necessarily rush rush to get it, not to say no reservation friends. Predetermined words directly to the restaurant, if unable to go ahead remember to unsubscribe. Culinary events in addition to fixed price menu outside the restaurant, food festival there are a number of other activities, such as Casa Loma Castle High Tea at the Castle, the specific details, you can click to view the culinary events, Tickets from December 14 sale has already begun. If you are not eating Death Star will take pictures of people consider attending blogTO photo challenge, the winner will get some reward, just send photos instagram plus tag #blogTOLicious it oh. (Pictured summerlicious 2015 photo contest winners by @prisharms taken in Cluny restaurant) on this issue is more than the entire contents of winterlicious, I wish everyone at the upcoming 2016 Chihaohehao learn to play good ~ Contact us: If you want to to contribute, please send direct mail to be forwarded only after authors@uoftada.com If you want to reprint our original text graphic message, please leave a message to the background, to give permission. title: 致即将开学的我们：这是不是你想要的生活？
author: 功能介绍
content: Caused by the upcoming school us: this is not the life you want? 2015-08-30Cheney ZUT assistant UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's more college students to facilitate the public to write this article as a number of reasons, because I wish I had someone write such an article to me. Straight to the point, in the past few years, I have actually been looking for a way of life, there is hope that a person can tell me how to live. To what good grades, participate in dragon boat team basketball team, he wanted to enter into a number of communities, many of my friends, there is a beautiful girlfriend. In appearance, like everything, you can fly with happiness. However, I know that he flies very bad, every day from the future endless stress and anxiety, there is no time and effort to accompany anyone. I can not find the reason, can not solve the problem, I think this is the life I chose. So, then she left. A way of life now tell you a story. The story is a bit long, the story is a microcosm of life, a lot of people, I hope that after listening to this story, you can let the new semester is about to come be thinking. This is a story of those who kept on the run, the protagonist called Mr.X. Mr.X since primary school onwards began to work hard, you can not lose at the starting line, so the big people are told he said. After six years of hard work, he entered the city's best junior high school, and that he was destined to get into the junior high school, he did. He was very happy, he was happy for two weeks. Because now he has to start thinking that the city's best high schools, and only those who entered the university the most Diao on the high school have a chance. So he desperately efforts in junior high school, he did not how to enjoy the process so hard, but he told himself: I went into the universities in the country's most Diao, to pay all the time will be rewarded by that time I will happy. And six years of suffering, he did, he received a heavy letters, and he did, not so big so happy. Then the next two months in summer, his carefree daze, peace of mind to travel and enjoy their results. Then he entered the university, happy two weeks. Pressure again, the university more competitive, he found that each person actually related to themselves as hard, so he must work harder, because he wants to get his dream job. Then he got in the freshman summer, when the share of internship opportunities, then the pressure appeared ... he had relaxed, and happy too, but these are easily the time after the end of the exam. But each time, as pressure reappeared, he did not understand why he was not happy, because it was all he wanted, but he has got everything he wanted before, and then he said: Yes, as long as I get the job, it will be better. So he continued efforts to continue to make their resume more handsome and more sexy, he was a member of three communities, two of which served as the Chairman, on 6 courses per semester. why? Because the survival of the fittest, no pain, no gain, if you are slacking off now after waiting regret it, his teeth, endured all the way. Finally, he got the job, he was happy silly. This is what he really wanted, he succeeded. He entered the company, everyone else is top university graduate, he could not believe the fate of such blessing himself, he felt his peak in the world. He was pleased for a week. Two weeks later, he found the school's pressure and the pressure can not be compared, he never leisurely time with friends and eat in the cafeteria, he works 80-90 hours a week, he did not enjoy. However, he told himself, would be good, he will do well, if he did come to this house the company's partner when he did not need to worry about the. He continued efforts, worked hard, he did not like his job, but said to myself: Just a little more effort, to endure a little pain, then there will truly be the ultimate reward of. Hard five years later, he did, he became a partner, the company's youngest partner. His music was crazy, direct repair of a holiday, this time he has married, bought a villa in the suburbs, luxury cars, he felt at the top of the cloud. This life lasted three months. Because he is now only a junior partner, he thought about becoming a senior partner thing? is it possible? Well, only strive to achieve, because not many people can climb the pyramid in this position, increasingly steep slope, the road more difficult. But he will succeed, he struggled, endured, not interesting, but he put up, he succeeded! No pain no gain. This time, he bought a more expensive house just for a holiday, as well as a new car, bigger, faster. Then he said, I was finally, finally able to relax. Then he began to relax, relax for two and a half months. He fell into a quagmire pressure. Because he was just a senior partner, managing director, however, only one, only one, think that position is almost impossible, but he determined he could, he has been a star of the figure, there is no reason to give up here. No fun at all, he did not spend much time with his loved ones together, almost missed his son lives in all the most important moments, with his wife's relationship drifted apart, the family rarely eat together, and because the family eat a waste of time, you can help him to become managing director thing? Great course, to accompany customers to eat it. Because there is anxiety in his mind, he climbs high enough, he had to prove himself. He said to himself: Finally a brook, so I went to become a managing director, I can get the ultimate happiness. A full seven years, in seven years the material has an absolute abundance, all the time not just a lack of time. He continued to struggle and struggle, and finally, he succeeded, the Board issued a statement, he boarded the Wall Street Journal front-page news, Xiao Ming became the managing director of this legendary company. He was extremely proud of, he is happy, he is happy for some time, then anxiety again ... One day, he walked into the office, sitting in a chair, feet resting on the table, after all, he is now the boss. He looked back to see Central Park, very beautiful, and now he is really, really stood the pinnacle of the world. Then, someone knocked on the door, knock on the door, he was startled, because the general secretary will come to him to inform him, most people could not come, after all, he is now at the pinnacle of the world. He opened the door to the people is Chairman of the Board. They were greeting each other, then Chairman said: This year's profit is incredible, doing good, impeccable. We are all proud of you, thank you for your presence. However, you should retire, you have a 72. This is the life of those who kept on the run, this is my dream life before, in the best case. Of course, this is only the general outline, but emphatically describes several special stages, not entirely so. Overall, however, it is kept on the run 'lives. Rat Racer, focus only from point A to point B, and then easily two weeks to a month, and then point B becomes the new A point, then this cycle, round and round, like a continued to climb roll mice. I had always been wrong in the past, I feel happy year struggle 11 months is to last month's kind of relief; Pinmingdiwang climb for a few years is to climb to the summit the moment list of small hills sense of accomplishment. That was my 10 years of life, there is no pain, no gain, fish and bear's paw can not have both, success and happiness as you can only choose. I only live in the future, tell yourself: Final finished the can relax, and that time everything will be it. Really is a big mistake. At the time I was Mr.X shadow, it is in a cage constantly running up mice. My best outcome is to repeat Mr.X that life. A lifetime of torment suffered stress, lack of time is a lifetime, a lifetime do not know what Pinmingdiwang climb, life just live for the future, in order to prove alive and really enjoy the moment when it is briefly from A to B above, then B has changed into a, he began a period of pressure being oppressed, being ruthless time of day, and so on, until you can no longer climbing the mountain, retired. How to do that? You mean I do not have goals no ambition? no. For a world-class university of us so we do not have the target is not equal to the ambitions of our lives. Another life and this life opposition, the pursuit of excellence is an attitude towards life. Both are wanted from point A to point B, the difference is: the former only has eyes for B, in his eyes is a straight line from A to B, B not reached before he can not stop to eat with his family, only to reach a B to qualify; the pursuit of excellence and a man who kept on the run with the point of view may be exactly the same, but it is the inherent nature of different, they have the same ambitions, may be greater, they work equally hard from the outside, they will pursue as a goal, the same way they have ups and downs in life, but they also enjoy the chase process. This is the difference between excellence and kept on the run and the most essential: they target the same desire, but they also enjoy the process. To the university, you can pay a lot of friends of the opposite sex better, after all, opposites attract, a group of Friends of the base is not to feel like that, you can also find a woman destined pots friends, learn to think when it is all fun. You still hard to learn, but you can enjoy this positive feeling, you can satisfy each of two hours 15 minutes on the strategic and repair, you can relax the body meditation for 15 minutes, or simply listening to their most like small apples for 15 minutes, or dinner with friends and simply chat. Weekly day off to put yourself, do what you want to do, yes, the examination is not over, but you need to restore, you need to invest, you to enjoy this day. Then you find that Monday, Wow, I feel the whole body is full of electricity, you really learn to High, doing the title, and then two hours later, give yourself the right to relax, give the opportunity to breathe on his own, give her a call yourself to say " I miss you, "the opportunity to help the family to give yourself a wash bowl, drag a land of opportunity. Then you continue for a High pursue their goals. Enjoy how no one qualified to teach you, these are the choices, of course, can make these choices is not easy, because the need is to change your thinking change, and most importantly, act. Is not the end, but rather the journey It's not about the destination, it's about the journey. "Live not for the battle won, live not for the end of the song, live for the along." Rat Racer regardless of how long to run , climb high, he may stand in the peak of the world, see it is their inner infinite empty, apart from the height of Language, nothing. Then he looked up, oh, can not stay, there is a higher slope to climb, and then were told: We thank you for your presence, but you have retired, you have a 72. Thank you very much have the patience to see here. Live not for the battle won, live not for the end of the song, live for the alone. We treasure our school to see. In parenthesis, if you have one of her (him), cherish it. title: 小土豆：我这么厉害我怎么不知道
author: UTzhushou
content: Small potatoes: I am so much I do not know how old the original 2016-07-06 UT and UT assistant assistant assistant UT Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's offers convenient public about the number of multi-authored Students - dissolute gentleman free soul coordinate Toronto University philosophy Specialist, Major political speculation outstanding writing ability, had counseling PHL100, currently serves as the auditorium was a lecturer at the University of Toronto this person well-known makeup institutions, under the kitchen, write articles with flavor, made cuisine full of old meditation and weekly lecture from about potatoes, you talk about politics with small potatoes: I'm so tired I do not know how ah harm how many of their students are very concerned about politics, often in the circle of friends to forward the text of some good depth. Unfortunately, many people are on the Canadian political system is not a correct and comprehensive understanding. Today, old and with our in-depth understanding of Canada's political system, installed X home learning essential knowledge! Since the separation of powers Montesquieu proposed legislative, judicial, administrative and political ideas in separate 1748, the separation of powers was immediately regarded as a fundamental rule of the Western democracies. Canada, too, the legislature, the courts, and administrative systems fragmented, contain each other. Due to the administrative and enforcement simply from legislation, today we explore the main Canadian legislative body, which is usually said that the "government." democracy? It is not majority rule? Many people have been attracted to Canada's democratic system in this country, but for "democracy" but this thing is not too understanding. Canada is not the so-called modern democracy one vote, majority rule. Such democracy is called direct democracy (direct democracy), in addition to modern Western countries will not direct democracy in a referendum, because such a system can only bring mob rule (tyranny of the majority) that the majority of people deprived of their minority s right. For example, in ancient Greece, parliamentary democracy that the decision by Socrates "poisoning the youth thought," he would impose the death penalty. To avoid such confusion really "tyranny," Canadian representative democracy (representative democracy), that is, one person, one vote to elect a constituency Members Members represent the interests of the people of the constituency in the House of Commons (House of Representatives) government, through the new law. Such a democratic system can ensure a bottom-up administration. A law passed by Members must meet the interests of the people He has chosen. In other words, under such a system, what your mother think you're not too cold, only you say your mom will go to cold you find clothes. Mr relationship with the ruling party has a membership of each of the Members of political parties, elected after the election largest party in the House of Representatives the most seats, it becomes the ruling party, the opposition has become more second, the third party is soy sauce (Oh no, this is my fabricated). Canada has three major political parties: The Liberal Party (Liberal Party, which is now the ruling party), The Conservative Party (the Tories, now opposition), as well as New Democratic Party, referred to as the NDP (New Democratic Party, the party now soy sauce ). Each political party will elect a leader, and the Prime Minister is the leader of the ruling party in Canada. Canadian Prime Minister Prime Minister is not elected by the people, the people's right to choose only the ruling party. Xiao Bian himself in 2015 general elections, when voting for the first time, and did not write Trudeau or Harper's name on the ballot, but only when all MPs in this constituency. In addition to the appointment of judges outside the Cabinet, the Prime Minister is not directly driven by the power of policy, the prime minister's powers be limited to the support of the Party Members. I think that the Prime Minister is very powerful because he represents his party launched the policy, even though the policy is not him. A variety of "small potatoes disastrous" articles like circle of friends turn, small potatoes said, "I have a disastrous power? I do not know how?." Government legislation to do just one thing every day, legislation. Initially, a bill will be presented to a Members, such as "how much from free tuition bill." If the final vote, the bill will be more free to learn on the Senate handed (senate). Canada has a very difficult senators and two sacred duties: paychecks, waiting to die. Since the Senate is appointed by the Prime Minister himself, rather than democratically elected (yes, that is hand-picked the meaning), they do not play any role for the bill. Free Learn more here in the bill is to take a process, then it will be submitted on behalf of the Queen of England in Canada: the Governor's hands. The Governor is a rubber stamp, it was delivered into his hands the bill he must sign an agreement, otherwise it is considered resigned. Governor after signing his words, learn more Free bill would become law, and more college students happy Big Dipper Ben. The legitimacy of the Government of Canada Government of Canada to give its legitimacy, the people of the votes from two sources, the support and the Queen. Democratically elected ruling party a natural legitimacy, because it represents the interests of the people, if not, then it will not be elected. It gets the vote can be seen as the people's mandate, so it has a natural legitimacy. Queen of England nominally the head of state of Canada, through Canada every law she must agree to pass. Although the Queen and there is no real power, but in name, she is a symbol of Canada, as well as every Canadian monarch. At the time of naturalization, you must swear allegiance to the Queen. As for why the queen had such a high position, probably because the long Meng it. A stable government in general, the composition of the Government of Canada from the people of the country begins. People who they think can represent the interests of its own Members, and then put forward by him in the House and by the law. title: 如何拯救程序员的拖延绝症：15分钟的效率法则
author: UTADA旗下为多大学生提供便利的公众号
content: How to save programmers ill delays: 15 minutes efficiency rules 2015-01-18UT assistant UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's more students to provide convenience to the public No. I always procrastinate. I will do a thing until the last minute before the start. I also learned to use ultra-efficient late to make up for the delay, anyway, I finally I can always finish it before the deadline! But I know my problem lies in: When I sit down to work, I was always the first to do a number of other irrelevant things. I call this state called light delay, probably you, too, it has the following "symptoms": sit down and start working before, always used first on the microblogging or browse other fun sites; always told myself that before the start there let yourself relax time of 10 minutes; there will always be those who do the trivial and less important things, such as check email, and so on. Finally, I have given this type behavior: sitting at the table, the general will really start working for half an hour or an hour later. Once I really started, you will find nothing to make me distracted, will finish the work. I began to realize either a blog or write code, I will follow this pattern of behavior. Once I put five minutes, we have been able to concentrate on work done. So the law was born 15 minutes I decided to do a little experiment. The next time I started working, unlike the usual force yourself to do a similar check mail as trivial things, but by the following steps: 1. elect their own to do a proper business (which makes you very clearly clear goals) 2. put all the interference terms are switched off for 15 minutes, do not let them bother you at this time 3. no interference without interruption down to business after 15 minutes 4.15 minutes, if I can not hold on, I'll give up or to do other things and as a result, then I threaded to work for 15 minutes, I certainly would not want to stop. Even those things that I had no power, and immersed in 15 minutes, I have become willing to complete it. Just read the book the first few chapters, you will gradually immigrants and would like to also read the later chapters. I also tried other methods to get rid of delays to improve efficiency, which to me is not so useful. For me, there are several questions: 1. they are too complicated, and requires 100% invested (entry which can be really high) 2 they generally emphasize the efficiency of ah, ah task priority, not that specific process 3. they always assume that people are the kind of person to be able to sit down and start to concentrate on the work (and it is difficult for me) I was kind of keen and respected time management people, those recommendations really good, but it Not suitable for me. My daily life schedule fact, many projects are identified, I can understand almost every hour of every day I do things. In this case, my problem is not to pick on me to do something, but how to do things efficiently and without delay. The above method is very similar to my Pomodoro Technique. I had a little heart contradict it, because they feel they can not afford to focus so long (25 minutes), so I shorten the time period, compressed into 15 minutes. Why does this method work? I think the main reason is because it let me have a positive momentum. That is when you do a post attached to 15 minutes, it is difficult to change to other roads. Focus is also the core of the 15 minute rule. Distracted if that is the nature of people, just like you're reading this article probably halfway will switch to another tab to see something else. So I forced myself to only a certain period of time focused on a single thing that would distract the little flame snuffed. In short this method allows me to focus, not interfere with other things. And it will not let me have too much pressure, I only know that I work for 15 minutes, without giving too much progress to set their own requirements. How to use this method to turn off all the other things in front of the interference, for example, turn off the independent tabs or turn off the phone. 2. Turn off the interference is not enough, you have to allow yourself to concentrate on 3. hands immediately, do not think too much. I also want to know "do" part, but when you think about thoughts would drift anywhere. You can write directly to a first draft, but not too much in order, and then a follow-up version of a version iterate. 4. If you think you can hardly started working, then you can brainstorm instead of "hands." But it must be written in the form of ideas or draw mind maps, not only in brain activity. 5. If after 15 minutes you can not stand, then give up. Take a break and come back. content: Course Guide to freshman life sci | method = + hard all the way to hang original 2016-06-29ADAUT assistant UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA facilitate public's number followed by freshman life sci courses all 4.0 multi College Students Great God - beauty school freshman Pa Katherine together to understand life sci course! As in recent years, very much sought-after program, life science can be described as a gathering place for beauty school bully. Light look st.george campus research building stands in many life science department will know how much it how high degree of attention, and improve laboratory equipment can definitely make you happy to enjoy a variety of experiments. Closer to home, life science freshman had a lot of basic courses, covering many areas of expertise, including BIO120 + BIO130, CHM138 +139 (16-17 school year onwards to CHM135 + 136) or CHM151, MAT135 +136 and PHY131 +132. Life science various professional courses for both physics and mathematics requirements vary, some may require only two optionally a detailed information, please refer Curriculum requirements u of t calendar given. Below, I will introduce you to these core subjects according to their own learning experience. Chemical CHM138 (16-17 school year to CHM136): Introductory Organic Chemistry This course is taught mainly organic chemistry, including the structure and reactivity of organic matter content is more complex abstractions, is the test of the students' perspective thinking. Thus, many new concepts rely on school professors Speed ​​fast thorough explanation is difficult to understand. But, fortunately, it is used textbooks CHM138 very powerful, plus a detailed explanation of the text with map image will be able to help you understand these abstract concepts. Therefore, I suggest that you here before each lecture briefly preview the content of this lesson again, this class does not like to listen to listen to the bible as a professor lectures. The study focuses on organic chemistry grasp the changing of the law, therefore, after-school summary is also essential, so as to clearly grasp the laws of structure and reactions. CHM139 (16-17 school year to CHM135): Physical Principle main content of this course is a chemical reaction in the physical principles, including the reaction rate, energy conversion, and so on, but many formulas are well understood. Since most of the formulas and constants are given in the exam, so there is not much need to remember the content, as long as they master the usage of each formula, the examination will not encounter too much trouble. This course involves a lot of calculation problems, so the data substitution, unit conversion and so need to be careful. Because of the difficulty of this course is significantly lower in organic chemistry, so a lot of sister school seniors have chosen the first semester on 139. Based on this increasingly common phenomenon, what year it was decided to code in Physical chemistry Organic chemistry before, so do not need to reverse the order music.brothers class. CHM151: Chemistry: the molecular scienceCHM151 is a year-round classes, mainly to provide basic course on the chemistry of the people, but last year I found a lot of students want to go biochemistry chose this course. Comparison 138/139, this course is more difficult class content, a wider range, but the content of the examination was relatively simple, the main challenge is the understanding of knowledge and the ability to draw inferences rather than memory capacity, so if there is to Chemistry is very interested, want to challenge the juniors could also consider freshman choose this basic course. Chemical experiments and quiz chemistry class has two quiz, a test in the tutorial, the subject is very simple, just read the textbook can do it (151 quiz will be on course community). The experiment in the quiz is to test the general lab manual The above experiment on the principles and procedures, and sometimes the title will be a very fine, very carefully the students need to prep lab manual. Experimental procedures are generally explained very clearly, as long as the step by step to make sure you can successfully complete the experiment. Finally he stressed that the chemistry experiment pre-lab and lab report must be carefully written yo, the lab report points is still very serious, we must be very careful to explain organized. Biological BIO120: Adaptation and Biodiversity Since this course is focused on understanding the principles of biological evolution and phenomena, it will look very much like the liberal arts curriculum. To understand the difficulty of the course content is not high, but wide knowledge, so the class can not let any details of the professor speak. Usually there will be a lot of reading, reading in any of the content are likely to appear in the examination. But personally think that this course is focusing on understanding, no need to remember all the force of knowledge, as long as the master and the fundamental laws of biological evolution and the concepts involved in the examination of the contents have not seen even in the face also it can be inferred out. But then, each exam will BIO120 biased Jidao particularly special topics, such as the vertical axis of a graph, like what lecture on what is mentioned, everyone doing the past test will know. . . So I suggest, the examination time do not stuck on a problem stalled, really I have no idea if they silently turn to the next question, then finish all the questions back to think of this question. BIO130: Molecular and cell biology if the high school had biology12, then 130 pairs of you, some of the relatively relaxed. Although there are still a lot of content need to read and remember, but as long as the reading are carefully read, in class professors emphasize knowledge carefully recorded, and when the test can be substantially bon voyage. BIO130 early classes and evening classes are not a professor post (BIO120 by the same professor taught early and evening classes), so a lot of people will go to rub teach better Prof.Yip evening classes, often a packed classroom , many students even stood behind lectures. Of course, do not rub on my friends, do not worry, just listen carefully in class, the same can learn. Biological experiments and quiz biological experiment with respect to the chemical may be less pressure, because the operation itself does not account for points, and does not require the completion of each experiment, a lab report, so doing it will feel a lot of fun, of course, often there will be no draw any useful data. Biological experiments in the quiz is also very simple, as long as careful prep lab manual can be successfully completed. BIO120 and BIO130 every door there is a very complex research project, the need to complete their own access to information, experimental design, analysis of the results. However, only one each semester, you can thoroughly enjoy this unique time of writing any of it! Mathematics MAT135 / 136 Calculus135 / 136 is a relatively basic mathematics in the two classes, with calculation and application-oriented, so for high school calculus over the Chinese people, this is quite easy to get the two points. According to last year's situation, 135/136 to drive down average, tend to last out of a very difficult subject in the term test, the class only a few people can write the correct answer, so much want to get in on these two courses high points, but also very difficult. Professor of mathematics which is the most popular Pro. Lam. He is both the course of the volume of people, for the class notes very well, everyone says that basically looked at his notes do not read. Of course, the most important thing is to learn to do mathematics problems, questions textbook, past test title should brush! MAT137 Calculus If you are very interested in mathematics, you can also choose 137 or 157. Because life science, select 157 is substantially not, and small compile is 137, so there is not a 157 highlighted. 137 with respect to the 135/136, the biggest difference is related to the more proof, so difficult than high school calculus to be larger. Here recommend Pro. Alfonso's class, he is also a roll of 137 people, lectures very conditioning, interpretation is very clear. Because Pro. Alfonso is a great personality of the professor, his lectures and ideas and are often the opposite of years, so in order to review his notes are based on the textbook, textbook supplement. Examination of moderate difficulty 137, in front of a few calculations or algebraic problem usually is not difficult, the difficulty is the concept behind the questions and proofs. However, examples of proof of concept and as long as the professor talked about class understanding thorough examination will not be baffled. Similarly, learning to brush 137 or title, alfonso open Society distributed to you on a textbook he recommended exercises you can do, because often ignored, so here is strongly recommended that you before the test can be done at the corresponding chapter title, although some large amount, but only to see many more questions to respond Pro. Alfonso protean exams. Physics PHY131 / 132: Introduction to Physics these two very basic physics lesson content, in addition to the beginning of the wave 132 may be a little challenging, other similar content and high school physics, the question is even simpler, so that friends can watching very simple circuit diagram on paper, while their GPA Imagine how this course is pulled. If does not have any interest in physics, I still do not recommend choose either subject, because there is not much new knowledge can learn. Or a very good physical and interested friends, it is strongly recommended PHY151 / 152 either subject, which involves proof, the formula is more complicated, and even talked about special relativity yo! Above it is the basis of life science freshman class, but because you want to join in the BR, Xiao Bian here can also recommend some elective courses, such as PSY100 Introductory Psychology (BR2), SOC102 Introduction to Sociology (BR3), etc. Elective do small series believe it depends on personal interest, because much of anhydrous lesson! Many life science friends want to go after the pharmaceutical aspects of development, it will be freshman elective one PCL102 The Act of Drug Discovery, learn about the process and the future of the Canadian pharmaceutical pharmaceutical development prospects. About learning, I think the most important thing is summed up. Before the examination of important knowledge, formulas, and the kinds of questions often arise sort, so as to better mastered, so that all the test sites are strung together in a line in the mind rather than the mess piled up in there. Not usually encountered in the content but also timely to ask professors or classmates, otherwise it will seriously affect the understanding of knowledge points behind. Exam review should as soon as possible, a week in advance is necessary to arrange the review plan, do not cram! Above it is my introduction to the life science freshman learning, we want to help, and finally here I wish you good health, all wishes come true! content: Rotman Curriculum Guide UT sophomore accounting assistant Raiders 2015-07-11UT assistant UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA facilitate the public's No. Students Benpian more courses introduced in part by the ECO Prep team friendship feeds. ECO Prep Team ECO prep team was founded by a number of large Rotman CGPA 3.9+ gods. ECO Prep original articles on Guoshu million words elective guidance, learning methods introduced, and find internships and work experience. By most professional of the heuristic method, over the past five years, 2000 to help students achieve excellent results in the ECO and RSM class. All team members are in the top investment banks, consulting, internships and four other companies are now full time office. Welcome to contact ecoprep@gmail.com with you big sister school exchange long theological discussion. The very bottom of the article there are 2015-2016 ECO220 and RSM219 / 220 communication group Oh! (Disclaimer: nothing to do with the exchange group ECO prep team) First of all, congratulations to you through the Rotman freshman layoffs! Students learn accounting, after very difficult, you finally decided to join the ranks of the CPA / CA / CMA accountants. If some people continue to freshman "Do not worry, no fear, no sense of shame" attitude in the next 2 - 3 years of undergraduate accounting, the students will learn accounting suffered various "people want to go out of the classroom, outside the classroom who want to come, "torture, and within a week and can be rushed from home on the road WO watch two or more sunrise Dongsheng from the library on the way home. * This bitter life only we understand. All in all the four full-time offer is the admission letter to senior school time. Until after watching other classmates were getting acceptance letter, we discovered that the original GPA workplace clouds. Four graduates admitted value is "soft skills" rather than "hard-ability." School finance students do not lucky, you even worse. Rotman worldwide financial top ten universities is a fact, but that is the MBA rankings. Employment RotmanCommerce financial graduates is really bleak. As a finance student, those useful math, RSM300 + / 400 + specialized courses, accounting courses (CFA syllabus), as well as technical question interview there is no time to prepare? Junior year, only to find the side everyone is busy looking for intern you, do not let yourself regret. "Pit father of it! I'm so hard to keep my 4.0 are to some god horse?" As accounting, finance students, after graduation in Toronto if you want to find the corresponding job, networking event right and wrong can not go in! Those CBC and India and Pakistan are preparing mock interview at you every day and small partners to play when, case competition, and a variety of networking. We will in the original "Internship Experience Guide" on the basis of updated more from experience, do please look forward to! ECO Prep sophomore big talk of God Accounting Courses: Since 2011 RSM219 emergence arrangements accounting curriculum was completely disrupted. From the beginning sophomore, 219> 220> 221> 320> 321> 426, after a previous one is the pre-requisite. In other words, as long as any of them drop a class, it must make up with Summer time.
