title: 老和开讲 | 退欧：世界级分手风波
author: UTzhushou
content: Old and lecturing | retreat Europe: the world-class original 2016-06-28 old storm broke and assistant UT UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's multi-university students to facilitate the public on a number of first history lesson retreat Europe referendum has ended 4 days, but the English themselves do not necessarily understand what the EU is. In the screams, "the British Independent" indignation after the British had to stay Meng turned weak weak to ask, "What is the EU?." . . Say the EU must first briefly talk about the history of the European egg pain. European terrain, even if the territory is not also bred dozens of different ethnic cultures. Our ancestors probably copied it, Europeans believe in "not my race, its heart will be different." Since the Renaissance battle it. In 1618 the first European large-scale war because of Martin Luther's Protestant want to get out in the open church incense other countries in Europe, and other countries to take this opportunity to start playing the "self-defense war." Europe is divided into old and new sects sect overtly fight for the faith, but in reality is a struggle for power sub-site child. First World War ended in 韦斯特法里亚 meeting, while the formation of a European "韦斯特法里亚 system", probably can be counted as the first time the EU. This system, European countries have the right to establish their own state religion as they see fit, so will stop the war. Taierbohe painted about confirmation ceremony 韦斯特法里亚 system collapse in 1648 Westphalia began in 1791, two years after the successful French Revolution. European countries are splashed his face bloody revolution, began to discuss the French Revolutionary Army killed in the French territory. Then a great idea, called juvenile Napoleon led the French army cut east west kill, destroy the anti-French alliance. French army Ruishi eventually lost to Russia's big, cold boundaries. In this friendly reminder to invade Russian friends, the first ready Canada Goose! (A slap in the face angry fans Hitler). The Second World War ended in the Vienna Conference, exiled Napoleon, the French admitted defeat, began a second European Union. After 100 years of peace in Europe, a war broke out in 1914, laid before the destruction of the European system again. The reason for the war in Europe is no longer called the war in Europe, because European colonies around the world have begun to battle it. After the war ended in 1918, he held a meeting in Versailles, formed the League of Nations, in unison, pointing to Germany, said, "The policeman is the man!" Eat Yaba Kui German only silence, until the outbreak of World War II. As a sequel to the war, he focused on a defeated Germany to make a comeback, put around the very Muslim neighbors annexation attempt to become a world power. Americans are angry, because when the world is their overlord Bank, how can allow a person to choke them? Germany once again to fight the Anglo-American coalition forces get on the ground, the world finally began a period of peace. This has to do with the EU? When a group of individual interests conflict with each other constantly, and bring peace to the world of the threat can not be ignored, those in power should take what measures? The easiest way is this rude individual interests of a group together to form a community of interests. This is the purpose of this fourth European Union, but also the fundamental EU legislation. EU member states there are three of the most important obligations and benefits: 1: As a people, the EU member states to pay their "meals." 2: member countries vote for EU legislation. 3: automatically considered citizens of member states of EU citizens, and the right to freedom of movement. From this we can conclude that three legal reasons with the EU in several British couples disharmony. First, the EU such "the British Turner nacional" organization, of course, be poor brothers welcome. After meals press force distribution may be welfare for everyone. And so the British Eton graduate of Oxford University's ancestral rich handsome is not necessarily so cold. Indeed, the perennial top three UK GDP in the EU in 2014 is more than France to become the second. Than the "crane tail" of Montenegro, Malta and other countries beyond forty-five times. Such a system back to the British EU to send strong evidence. After the British withdraw from the EU, it can no longer contribute to the EU duty, from the regulation of the European market. There is also a problem, due to the freedom of movement of population, behind other European countries people would have flocked to Britain, the British employment to locals burden. Moreover, compared to other refugees British immigration policy is relatively liberal countries can also be the opportunity to other countries as a springboard to further "invasion" of the United Kingdom. The UK is no way, because as the EU member states have to abide by the rules. Why not return it? Britain left the EU to send what theory? First, the EU is just a collection of man-made law, and can not control the market "natural law." Retreat Europe after the United Kingdom can not really put their continental plates tilt from Europe and moved somewhere else. Britain still needs Europe, Europe can no longer retire after the privilege of free trade of goods, but also time-consuming re-agreed trade treaty with the European continent, things work a half times. Besides immigration, why oppose refugees? Currently voice against refugees than naked racism row with his heart, but also could not find any decent answers. Raiders only for reference, if the discrepancy between the official website, the official website be sure to prevail. 2016 University of Toronto contribution Raiders (new) year tuition has gone up a series of 1 Where can I see my tuition? How much is currently run two daily enrollment students pay site, one end of 2016 will be canceled operations rosi (http://www.rosi.utoronto.ca/), the other is rosi evolutionary upgrade version -acorn. Two pages this year can pay. >> >> Using ROSI See tuition fees using ACORN view (after financial account login click the left you can see this page friends ~) 2 where you can see the charges detailed? What charges have? Click "view invoice" you can see the details. The total cost includes tuition (4 credits this year and charged over a unified program fee, 3.5 credits and tuition fees according to the following specific number of courses), the learning in school and enjoy benefits expenses (student services, gym, newspapers, etc.), Insurance (health insurance with dental insurance), as well as system access fee, and so on. Specific invoice details can be introduced much poke official website: http: //www.fees.utoronto.ca/sessions/2016_2017/making_Payments/making_a_Fee_Payment.html3 pay what information? Where can I see? Shown above in red numbers that you need to pay tuition fees. You can also choose to pay part of the (minimum payment), you can see the minimum payment on your invoice. It is said that as long as you pay the minimum payment you can register for courses before the deadline (August 23). In addition, you also need an account number, this will be displayed at the top of your invoice (basic structure is the most include your last name in uppercase letters plus the top five of the 10 student identification card -ex. JI KE 1000123456 - account number: KE1000123456) 4 which has several ways to pay for it? [Canada] as long as your bank account at the following bank, you can use the following three methods to pay tuition: Bank of Montreal (BMO) Royal Bank of Canada (RBC) ScotiabankCanadian Imperial Bank of Commerce (CIBC) TD Canada TrustHSBC Bank CanadaMost credit unions (most credit unions) (personal use is not recommended) Note: no matter which method you use, generally need 3-5 business days to appear on ROSI above. On the other hand, domestic banks can issue international money order only a few students want to use this method of payment be sure to confirm in advance, do not miss the payment deadline. title: 【Stephen Cook】He defined a class of “hardest problems”
author: UTzhushou
content: [Stephen Cook] He defined a class of "hardest problems" original 2016-02-09GraceUT assistant UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's more students to provide convenient public No. Although much of the quality of teaching has been diluted in recent years, enrollment suspects, sometimes while classes will not help Tucao why this teacher can teach to much, but in fact there are still many hidden much power and name (and perhaps small series too ignorant) Daniel professor, or else why the year ranking standings when they are tyrants bit ring yet. As Professor worship series first bomb, I give you about today is honorary professor CS and Math Department's Stephen A. Cook. Scientist Stephen CookStephen Cook is known as one of the computer scientists for outstanding contributions to the theory of computational complexity. [Computational complexity theory] Computational complexity theory (Computational complexity theory) is a branch of theoretical computer science and mathematics, which uses mathematical methods for quantitative consuming calculations required resources analysis and study of various problems in the calculation of the relationship between the degree of complexity and fundamental nature, it is the theoretical basis of the analysis of algorithms. One of the results of computational complexity theory is the most prominent theory of NP-complete (NP-complete). Briefly, NP complete theory refers to a study in the complexity of the class, there may exist a "most difficult or the most complex problems." Stephen Cook in the establishment of the NP complete theory for the study of the relationship between the complexity of the proposed class "complexity reduction" (complexity reduction) is still one of the most commonly used reduction method now. On the basis of the Cook reduction on the other computer scientists have a different model defines some additional complexity reduction, for example, more than a reduction, reduction and random truth table reduction and so on. Popular little explanation, the problem Professor Cook studied computer can not solve any kind of problem. Even if not CS professional students must also understand the study for the development of computer science it has a kind of important. Speaking Professor Cook, it should be his most famous 1971 paper published in The Complexity of Theorem Proving Procedures. This paper is NP complete theory laid the foundation, but also earned him the 1982 Turing Award. [Turing Award] I believe we are not familiar with the name of Turing, yes, the name is the Turing Award from the computer science pioneer, British scientist Alan Mathison Turing. Turing Award originated in 1966, so far a total of 62 winners. Turing Award nominations without any restrictions, but the selection was very strict, only for one (or several collaborators) an achievement reward annually. Turing Award status in the computer industry is very high, is known as the "Nobel Prize of computer science," the major awards. 2013, Professor Cook was awarded the Gerhard Herzberg Canada Gold Medal for Science and Engineering and research funding one million knife. And in this the beginning of 2016, Professor Cook has won two honors: Canadian Association of Computer Science 2016 Lifetime Achievement Award, and international awards "BBVA foundation Frontiers of Knowledge Award in the Information and Communication Techbolodies category". Professor Stephen Cook after he gained his MA and PhD from Harvard University, first as assistant professor at the University of California, Berkeley, in 1970 came after much to teach, it has been 46 years. Not a lecture professor and can not be called a good teacher, very often a formidable scholar is not a powerful teacher. But Stephen Cook academic achievements not only deep, but also teach classes full of praise. Rate My Professor Stephen Cook on everyone evaluation of almost all despite feeling he taught undergraduate courses is one of the most difficult (this year he teaches is CSC463), professor himself was "very approachable and helpful", his class good harvest many. ▲ screenshot from Rate my Professor Stephen Cook, after all, is old and does not know how many years will continue to teach in the book how, after reading this presentation Have you ever wanted a little heart rub a little lesson selected Stephen the Great God Xianqi yet. title: 关于「人工智能 A.I.」—— 我有故事和酒
author: UTzhushou
content: On "AI Artificial Intelligence" - I have the original story and wine 2016-03-08 Jesse Zhang, JUT assistant UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's more convenient for students to provide public I want to talk about a number of modern distance science and technology far science fiction story. Movie "A.I: Artificial Intelligence", there is a loved programmed robot boy David. In order to save the mother who lost a child, David entered as a substitute for a family, but gradually fell out of favor, his mother abandoned by humans. Later, he was thousands of miles across, only a desire to achieve the impossible - to become a real child, returned to the side of his beloved mother. Movies so many people stuck in my throat, not only because of human selfishness and varied, and the eternal loyalty program, but also because of the story behind, as if there are many problems humanity must face: "? Are based on the material basis of emotion," "thinking you can manually copy it? "," when love and creativity become artificial, you'll enjoy still afraid of it?. " Perhaps you will say, "AI closest thing I've ever seen, nothing more than recommended commodity Taobao, Netease cloud music" Daily Song ", at most, will be able to easily molested Siri, sometimes will deviation, these are weak artificial intelligence, from the real ability to have human AI that much difference. "Do not judge! wish to go down to look at the technological frontier step. A month ago, google developed AlphaGo Go to defeat European champion, fell on the last human chess project; Then, there are almost perfect from google can adapt to the external environment of the robot Atlas. This may indicate a growing will, "calculating" in the A.I. into human life. Imagine a robot has a human appearance sitting across from you and your chess, chess can often see through your routine method, how would you feel? Follow technology news people will feel vague: artificial general intelligence has been exposed tip of the iceberg. A.I. This hot topic has provoked a lively discussion seems more than ever, the ability to limit either on ethical or on artificial intelligence. The machine can get emotional? I want to talk from the second story. I was in a bookstore reading many years ago when a science fiction novel, called "count", formerly known as "Newton's New Clothes." It talked about the future, forecasting and consulting analysis, and related occupations no longer exist. Only one called "energy" of the computer, it is a very powerful artificial intelligence that can calculate everything. But the end of the book, the male and female to win, because "can" love them can not be calculated, so that the computer can calculate the crash. Therefore, artificial intelligence, it is not the bottleneck? In the end they can not learn human feelings? However, like Helen of Troy after seeing Yang Guo suddenly understand what love is the same; as one day you see a gray-haired father felt the same guilt and sorrow and grief - the machine is difficult to obtain certain human emotions, because these emotions It looks more like a soul "awakening" not acquired. The machine can detect changes in your body Liheermeng, testing out your adrenaline sudden rise, it is difficult to take the initiative to produce complex and subtle human heart, indescribable emotion. But the machine can interpret a person from the big data: the human behavior through the full range of recording, after calculation, analysis, resulting in a seemingly emotional conclusion. Technically speaking, A.I. How about you exactly how to read? Today's artificial intelligence is divided into roughly three categories: classic AI (Classic AI), a simple neural network (Simple Neural Networks) and biological neural networks (Biological Neural Networks) among the most "smart" way is biological neural networks. (Examples of biological neural networks: Numenta manufactured Hierarchical Temporal Memory) For ease of understanding, give life example: A company would like to find hidden in the workforce of some bad employees, these employees find malicious behavior in the workplace, For example, disclosure of confidential business documents. Without employees browse mail premise, how to use A.I. know who is abusing power? "Biological neural networks" would get from there to every employee data (such as a file being viewed daily frequency number, mail number, etc.), and then automatically to each individual to establish "normal state behavior norms," ​​a model. Then the system would be predicted from what normal behavior of each employee, what is abnormal behavior Yes. All modular computing are all done automatically, without any manual intervention. Thus, for each individual independent model, then as data changes constantly self-correct adjustment (what we call learning ability), and dynamically identify malicious employees. (Source: Jeffhawkins & Donna Dubinsky) It would appear that a pre-written program, you can follow the changes in the human make the appropriate changes, and then even have creativity. However, when such re-creativity continues to progress, even to the "active thinking" in height, whether brewing tragedy? I want to say third story is a microcosm of a lot about the "A.I transgression mankind" works. Movie "I, ROBOT" ( "I, Robot") and tells the story of one day in the future, due to the hard work of scientists, robots replaced humans do all the work. There is also a very powerful artificial intelligence VIKI help people solve analyze various problems, but after a time for self-promotion, it analyzed, and worked hard to maintain law and order, compared to save in times of crisis, imprisoned, limit human, It is the best way to ensure human reproduction. It controls all the robots eventually began a controlling human revolution. Do not rush to say that this situation can not, and do not use the robot's behavior is defined as "unjust." Behind this involves intelligent philosophy (Philosophy of Artificial Science) and the Philosophy of Mind (Philosophy of Mind) issue. You can try to think about the interesting question: to what extent the machine intelligence with human intelligence was equal? Machine moral, immoral, or moral, is a human problem, or AI problems, or "we" common problem? Since the "morality" is a human-defined, they can be judged by the machine do? ... ... (From "" smart "philosophy - Man and Artificial Intelligence") based on Turing (AM Turing, 1912-1954) in the "MIND" published in "Computer and Intelligence" (Computing Machinery and Intelligence) one article, "Turing test" (Turing test TT) test was used to compare the human intelligence and artificial intelligence. But in fact, "Comparison between man and machine," not a problem, the problem is "Turing test" the test whether "right", and this is tantamount to man or machine "correct" what is .... .. Back to the science and technology fields. Technically far less people today to obscenity, "I, Robot" this story, how could let humans wanton development of artificial intelligence? Has long been wary of humans, you can always turn off the button in the future development of artificial intelligence. Think of cloning it. Since humans do not accidentally invented the nuclear bomb, humans have learned moderation. Just as we will not continue to study how to make a cloned person. We have to do is strive to develop, then the last step before the cliff to tighten the reins on the horse's neck. After the development of technology to a node might exponential growth, the impact of this explosive growth brought about by unpredictable, humans do not know where to stand curve. Distant future, perhaps at hand. There are a lot of stories about A.I. The human brain was wide open infinite: AI who fell in love with the owner or produce emotional, or independent thinking have launched an uprising, or even creativity has a strong productivity program replaces all apes, is even analyze heterosexual deserve heresy trial ...... that time humans may big fun. However, if there is artificial intelligence comparable to human beings that day, I would think that would not be related to A.I like horror movies. If a robot to understand human emotions at the same time there is full reason, it is more likely to be good like a spoiled dog flattering, but also as experts like sister tease capture your heart. As the "Cyborg She", once the AI ​​can understand human emotions, then his master becomes "love IQ is negative," the state simply will not be too easy. As you can always easily from where your parents get the support and connivance of comfort, like an undercover robot is also very easy as capturing your trust. Today, we can do most want to achieve, it is to continue to make machines smarter. But do not forget - our ultimate goal is not the development of technology, but the realization of human happiness. "Human talent is the most great rights to chase the dream." - <AI> Huobiboshi ADA Cool CS motherfucker take you to see the world's Little Helper check for you to learn life information (Wechat ID: utzhushou) Read the fine Complaints the authors selected a message that has been set to be concerned about the message before you can write a message to the author of the article is set to be concerned about the message before you can write a message loading more comments from the public after a number of filters to display details about comments feature micro-channel sweep the attention of the public number

title: ADA娘｜苹果WWDC发布了什么
author: UTzhushou
content: ADA Mother | WWDC Apple released the original 2016-06-15ADA NIANGUT what aides UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's multi-university students to facilitate public number to talk about here, the article comes with a lot of pictures (slang said multi-map to kill the cat), the reader master see these words when traffic has basically gone, so I do not read the words to live traffic yo. Toronto time yesterday afternoon around a little, Apple held once a year, Apple's WWDC event routine at Bill Graham Civic Auditorium. Given iOS9 updates mediocre, old Macbook Pro refresh cycle deadline approaching, coupled with the recent major media predict publish content to wait on her face, WWDC opening ceremony became the focus of the masses of onlookers. First talk about WWDC conference. WWDC held once a year as Apple Worldwide Developers Conference, held annually in May and June. In accordance with the laws in previous years, Apple will be released at the conference for the next-generation platform for their own individual operating system, and then start up a public beta process three to four months. Meanwhile, Apple also introduces new features that its own device ecosystem at the conference, the conference is no exception. So then let ada Mother to tell you about the conference exactly what released. When the General Assembly beginning, Apple CEO Tim Cook to Orlando just two days before the terrorist attacks occurred expressed their views, and led the audience participants Mourning for the victims. Subsequently, Cook describes the growth and development of the Apple developer community since this year, but confessed to update the conference will be published watchOS, tvOS, OS X and iOS four platforms. watchOS 3 First watchOS introduce 3. Apple watch released a year and a half since the vast majority of people have not been able to get recognition. The main reasons are watchOS such as a new platform, Apple is still in the exploratory stage, many functions seem immature, such as application load time is too long, interactive way flawed, over-reliance on mobile phones as well as the early problems. Staff came first, the new system will allow common applications running in the background, reducing the loads and load time. Subsequently, the staff of the newly designed dial sets, including "Yes, you read right warm miracle general facelift Minnie dial", "see you the day before moving much further sedentary ah do not want to fat plate movement is dead, "and" the hour hand points to where I'll tell you what time it is where the dial "............ but also increased the lateral sliding switch to a different dial gestures to respond to different scenarios. It can be seen Apple's mind is very delicate (?). In addition, the new system will bring about a new handwriting input mode, supports multi-language input; a key alarm function, it is worth mentioning that in different locations for the system will automatically provide a local alarm calls, such as Hong Kong police phone becomes 999; deep breathing using the whole system to help users at the appropriate time relieve fatigue, relax. In addition, the new system for the wheelchairs to provide a new motion algorithms to track the use of different wheelchair user movement. Apple has very carefully put on a timed reminder notice from standing watch with disabilities "Time to stand" changed to "Time to roll". In recent months, Canada has just landed Apple Pay has also been upgraded to support payment within the application on your watch, (to lift a hand to buy buy buy it). tvOS Next, Apple introduced a new tvOS. The new tvOS equipped with upgraded Siri now supports more comprehensive and intelligent search. Meanwhile, Siri, users can change the channel of the completion of the operation, rather than as before each application you want to open and then find another channel. The new system also inherits a function key authorization application, rejected the application before the need to open the page to find the authorization code and then manually enter the tedious process. In addition, Apple also released a new remote control application, apple tv now includes all the features of the remote control, and also supports virtual keyboard. Apple also said, apple tv smart home will become the center of the device, with a domestic rice "is the core router smart home" remarks similar. By the way, the core of Google's smart home is a sound (???). macOS SierratvOS introduced after the staff to bring up one of the highlights - the new OS X. Prior to the Internet rumors Apple's upcoming OS X renamed macOS, the message on the diagram the little brother came to power soon after confirmed. Apple canceled before the two versions of the home computer operating system named after big cats tradition (estimated to be on the big names running out) in favor of California place names. Following Yosemite and El Capitan, the new system named Sierra. In the three-screen a cloud to implement the concept of the spirit in the end, macOS enhance the use of cloud storage that sync your desktop files to a different computer, and mobile phones can also access your desktop files. In addition, macOS also brought universal clipboard, copy something on the computer can be directly attached to the mobile internet. Continue Apple Pay. Now you can put your Apple one machine to take paid (not) on pos machine. macOS support payments in the webpage, implying Alipay Apple version. Describes the small features multi-window merge tabs like after, Siri was brought on macOS, the audience clapping, both inside and outside the store suddenly filled with merry atmosphere (not). After Win10 bring voice assistant Cortana desktop users, we are looking forward to Apple can do. According to reports, Siri is very powerful, support for contextual dialogue, the search results directly drag and drop, etc., and integrates semantic search Spotlight updated last year. The gray-haired Boy iOS10 then went on to explain iOS10. Major update has ten o'clock: the new lock screen, Siri, the intelligent keyboard, gallery, maps, music, news applications, smart home applications, telephony, messaging, little tiny work, thank you. [] The new lock screen lock screen swipe to the right to cancel the apples from the beginning of the first generation followed unlock features, replaced by tap the home button to unlock. Lock screen camera slide left and right sliding widgets, from the bottom up is still a control center. However, Apple seems to slightly change the style, from the notification to the menu have adopted the form of a card-type interaction. Apple's design have to say this has yet to be polished (ugly). [Siri] iOS10 of Siri to third-party applications open permissions, you can now call Siri help micro letter. (So ​​call Siri can help me write articles do? Some cards support more interaction, such as clicking directly watch the game live and so on. [Keyboard] Keyboard mainly joined the context of intelligent input suggestion, keyword into a key emoji. title: 【干货】SB打败MB？Microsoft Surface Book测评
author: UTzhushou
content: [Dry] SB defeat MB? Microsoft Surface Book evaluation original 2015-11-08Justin93UT assistant UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA facilitate the public's number is more college students October 6, 2015, Microsoft held a new conference. Compared to Apple, Microsoft's conference has always been tepid, but this is big news broke, released a variety of windows 10 devices. Which most attention is surfacebook. As a technology (si) surgery (zhai) Associations, ADA will not miss the opportunity to try a variety of black science and technology, so we bring this issue is surfacebook depth evaluation. Not much to say, first on the map! Appearance and hinge design if the surface pro like a tablet, then surfacebook appearance and 13.5-inch screen that is more close to a standard laptop. Overall, surfacebook looks quite satisfactory, but there are many bright spots, such as: due to the special extension of the hinge structure, when the notebook is closed when the sides there are still gaps. To be honest, I do not think this design how beautiful, but a later investigation, it was found that the design of Microsoft's intention: This is first of all start with the weight of surfacebook. Surfacebook total weight of 1.51 kg, wherein the plate (screen) 0.73kg, 0.78kg base, that is, the weight ratio of the screen and the base close to 1: 1, the ratio is much higher than normal notebook. Compared to conventional shaft, this particular structure can make the length of the extension of the base increases 2cm increase balance, so that the surface book can and normal notebook as a constant opening and closing angles stand on the desktop. After all keyboard base housing, in fact, the biggest difference between the surface book and surface pro is that this base, since the keyboard surface book called real keyboard (in fact, only be regarded as the surface pro type cover). Overall, surfacebook the feel of the keyboard is satisfactory, although not as good as before I used thinkpad (thinkpad keyboard feels very good indeed), but with a considerable progress compared to surface pro. In addition to feeling outside, surfacebook surface pro keyboard would also be more than one button, and that is flat eject button when you want to take down the plate when the need to press this key. Here to talk about life endurance. In light of this, when selected, we certainly are concerned about their endurance. Before discussing surfacebook of life, we take a look at its unique dual-battery design. Surfacebook put a battery on a flat where a battery placed inside the base. When in tablet mode, consumption is flat in the battery, the notebook mode, the base preferentially consumed in the battery, and then use the plate in the battery. According to the official statement, life notebook mode for 12 hours, four hours for the tablet mode, found slightly less than the official data, but, overall almost. It was noted that life in tablet mode, only four hours, why so little? Because in 13.5 inch flat plates it has been considered a great. To control the tablet weight, surfacebook only sacrifice a little plate of life, the main battery in the dock. Therefore, from the endurance it, surfacebook more suitable for it primarily when the notebook occasionally when the tablet users, rather than primarily as flat, occasionally when laptop users. Performance and then cooling performance and heat dissipation. I tested model is I5-6300U their set was, 8gb RAM, 256G SSD. Overall, and other ultra-pole of this, as part of such an arrangement is more than writing the code, play big games less configuration. I did not test this machine on the big game, but on this machine to play for half an hour of furnace slag, a bit cpu temperature test: the case of the card game itself does not appear, but the temperature is slightly higher a bit, while the fan sound began rang. So from the perspective of the game, surfacebook not too fit, but occasionally play a small game of course is no problem. Surface Pen said so much, in fact, did not address the core strengths surfacebook or surface series. Yes, that's it - I had also thought about buying macbook, but then still want to have a computer with handwritten notebook used in pdf or onenote taking notes, so the final choice of surface. Surfacebook on the surface pen with the previous generation of surface pen similar overall appearance, the main difference is that the rubber keys from the side moved to the end of the pen, to enhance the sensitivity of the pressure sensor. Overall, with the surface pen to take notes is very convenient. Of course, there are other surfacebook also some bright spots, such as with the highest support 16gb RAM, optional discrete graphics, etc., due to (mei) Room (qian) reasons, not described in detail. Overall, surfacebook although there are still some disadvantages (such as life problems tablet mode) but for everyday office for learning, be regarded as a very good product. title: AlphaGo | 赋予输赢的意义
author: UTzhushou
content: AlphaGo | original meaning given to winners and losers 2016-03-09 Zhe ♂ school assistant UT Helper UT Helper UT assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's number to facilitate public are welcome to express their views to vote for multiple Students: Before the game, artificial intelligence, often hear remarks as follows: "rewrite the history of mankind" "AI challenge last barriers of human intelligence," "different victories, how will affect the subsequent development of artificial intelligence" and wait for the results of staying up late to watch the battle of little friends are leave a deep and rich philosophical significance of the statement: "human pills", "human eating dates pills" "AI horrible bird" Lee stone and AlphaGo after the first game, the circle of friends actually haunted by inexplicable terror. "Young awesome" become final "AI awesome" yet? Since AlphaGo beat Fan rejoice now that is hindsight, we look at the parties before the battle of words. Kai-fu Lee answered in the know almost: the Google approach takes advantage of big data + depth of learning, and almost did not use domain knowledge of chess, so if after going up chess again, I would not be surprised. Conference Li Shishi, said he spent less than five minutes to decide to accept the challenge of the machine. It is the reason some time ago Fan Hui defeat shocked. Google invitation, I felt for a long time to prepare. If it fails, then might affect the popularity of chess, artificial intelligence can beat our word is inevitable in our lives. Chinese national chess team coach Yu Bin said: If you win a Shishi, or Fan Hui 5-0 win it is true, then I think the human machine complete victory is not far. In fact, the answer is that it's 5-0 win Fan Hui is not true. On the chess AI Undeniably, the duel of great significance. No matter which side win, we will usher in all thinking and lively discussion on the new round of artificial intelligence. It can indeed become a landmark event, so that we seem to be something missing at the same time if obtained. At the same time, we have to consider the opposite: win or lose it really so important? AI really so terrible it? Why we must take mankind and created AI pendulum in the opposite? As if life and death is the right close thing. Explore the limits of science and technology in various fields produced a new definition. Let us introduce another hot topic: Redefining on stronger faster and higher. Compared to the game such as equipment upgrades sharkskin swimsuit, and even standard stadium, racket more lightweight, more accurate timing instruments and scientific training methods and even steroids and other drugs with a pan of these science and technology for sports penetration movement both ethereal and intangible unstoppable. We refresh the limits of human record, while constantly gives new definition limits. We say AlphaGo thirty million since Yi Bureau, and mankind is it not seek solace from their tools repeatedly in chess history to surpass themselves, again and again. The purpose of this board game is to find the optimal solution, mankind lost AI is not something terrible. Science and technology so faithfully presented the results we want, and this particular use of computer technology to improve the success ratio and objective way why do they still controversial? What are we afraid of? What human fear? Every self-transcendence is the soul of tremor, we have a good surprise in the chess game artificial intelligence, it should also be extremely surprised human attitude towards artificial intelligence. Starting the tournament was undoubtedly the most exciting part of the start from the perspective of chess. We have to mention the word "bigger picture" (@ 09) for artificial intelligence, the chess game is the beginning of the time of senseless force. Compared to human intuitive grasp of the bigger picture is, AI over the details carefully will certainly contain its entirety of the control. When opening a high complexity of the algorithm, a large amount of data AlphaGo will bring no small pressure. AlphaGo catch mistakes stone Lee shaking reversal of the situation? According to the process of the game, then the board is divided into small portions, large-scale improved the accuracy of the algorithm in the disk after big advantage to win the details of the deal. There is a trick in which AlphaGo comeback, do not know if you've read the Xu Zhu break Jane Long chess game that section eighteen Dragon: home of the death stupid chess students then, let us have given the illusion of winning or losing, the results actually hit the face Pa Pa Pa . Let's go on out of science ELOELO rating system refers to a method of evaluation to measure the level of activity of various types of chess by the Hungarian-American physicist Arpad Elo created today is recognized as the authoritative chess Assessment Method. It is widely used in international chess, football, basketball and other sports. Online game League of Legends, World of Warcraft competitive battle system is also used within this classification system. (Wikipedia.kfd.me/zh-cn/ rating) Here's the algorithm interpretation, Arpad Elo said: players in each game's performance into a normal distribution; later Logistic Distribution generally considered more reasonable. In one game, the winning party is considered better performance, the loser is considered poor performance; if a tie, the two sides roughly the same performance. Appearing in formulas Ea / Eb player to a desired value of A / B, i.e., the probability of A / B of the player wins. When the game players A and B, the desired performance can be calculated according to the formula of two players. Ra / Rb is player A / B Current Ranking points. If a player's performance is better than expected, then the player's ranking should rise. On the contrary, if the performance not as good as expected, the ranking will drop. Sa Council for the players A score (1 or 0), K is a constant, the greater the value, the faster the score changes, the chess master usually take 16. Use this formula to calculate the level of the players after the game A Council points to finish. Also on the Logistic distribution is as follows: Fan Hui Chinese-born French occupation Go in terms of financial Sec. Fan Hui-year-old began to learn to go to Xi'an, the segment in 1996, Sec 1998, moved to France in 2000. On several occasions on behalf of Europe in the world chess game. October 2015, Fan was invited to rejoice with Google DeepMind developed out AlphaGo dividing the first five innings contest, AlphaGo 5: 0 victory record to beat Fan Hui, Fan Hui became the first in the nineteenth road board on, just get close to points being defeated Go software professional players. (Wikipedia.kfd.me/zh-cn/ Fan Hui) Lee Se-dol Qifeng sharp early, large-scale Gongsha good, outstanding achievements in recent years, grow older and mature technology, started to change for the all-around playing style, can attack to defend, firmness and flexibility become a generation of chess masters. Lee Se-dol powerful place lies in his chess style ethereal spirit magic, often have flash in the pan, both strong fighting force and the calculation is very accurate. He also has a high level of psychological quality, often catching up on the World Series to win reversal of victory in the circumstances behind. During 2005 and 2010 the first Chinese chess Coulee Kau who had numerous encounters, under great attention. (Wikipedia.kfd.me/zh-cn/ Lee Se-dol) on AlphaGo 2016 Nian 1 28 January "Nature" in the form of a cover paper describes Google's DeepMind has developed an artificial intelligence named AlphaGo, which has been defeated European Go championship, and in March this year with the World champion Lee Se-dol game. The program uses two depth neural network, policy network and value network, greatly reducing the need to consider the complexity of the search space, reducing the breadth of the former search, which reduces the depth of the search, like the human brain when the next go with intuition fast locking strategy thinking. Value Networks (Value Network) and Policy Networks (Policy Network), where Value Networks assessment board position, Policy Networks select chess footwork. The neural network model through a new training method, combined with the human race learned experts supervised learning, as well as himself and his own board games (Self-Play) learned reinforcement learning. About Google DeepMind Google DeepMind is a British artificial intelligence company, founded in 2010, named DeepMind Technologies, 2014, acquired by Google, renamed Google DeepMind. The company was founded by Demis Hassabis, Shane Legg and Mustafa Suleyman. The company goal is to "solve smart", they try to learn the best methods and systems neuroscience by merging the machine to build powerful learning method. They tried to formalize intelligence, and thus not only to implement it on the machine, but also to understand the human brain. The company's current focus is to study the gaming computer systems can study a wide range of game, strategy board game from Games to Go. Cuba (Cuba): Toronto and surrounding mention fun and cheap place, Cuba Cuba first must be it! The most important thing is that Cuba Chinese passport visa-free, is truly stay away trip! Here, Xiao Bian teach you the way you are right sentence Spanish is Hola! A Chinese passport and a Hola traveled to Cuba are not afraid. Official Name Republic of Cuba from the Taino word "coabana", meaning "fertile land", "good place." Cuba by the more than 1,600 islands, Havana (La Habana) the "Caribbean Pearl", is one of the largest cities in the West Indies and the world's most beautiful cities. Havana: Havana, as a World Heritage site is the most famous Spanish-style old building, where homes, churches, narrow streets, small squares, cafes, theaters, fountains, castles and fortresses and both are made of stone , do not have a style! Building on the street have a great taste, full of classic cars, one is wandering in a daze taking pictures are enough. There are many unique night bar, you can try their mojito. Town Varadero: the world-famous with "ivory powder," said the Varadero is one of the attractions can not miss, there are 22 kilometers of white sandy beaches, is one of the top ten world's most famous beach! In addition to the Caribbean to enjoy sunny beaches, diving, swimming with dolphins or something, but also very interesting! Any one of the Harry Potter fans can not miss Ollivander wand, Quidditch uniforms and butter beer! Here, Hogsmeade and Diagon Alley welcomes Muggles visit. Approximate cost = 500 (round trip) + 300 (three-night stay) + 350 (tickets) + 100 (Transportation) Recommended Duration: 3-5 days Puerto Rico (Puerto Rico): Puerto Rico Puerto Rico, in Spanish means "wealthy Hong Kong", located in the eastern Caribbean Sea, the Greater Antilles, but also a little farther than Cuba, but the part of US territory. Some people say "February snow in New York, Puerto Rico, February silver sand, clear water," simply hold the United States to check can enjoy the sunny beaches of the Caribbean, why not? ! Sunny beach many places, and by the Spanish, Indian, African and American cultural influences in Puerto Rico but no replicable. The capital of San Juan San Juan: full of narrow cobblestone streets, colorful colonial buildings and distant fortress history, such as 圣卡塔利纳 Palace and San Felipe Moro fortress. Fluorescence Lake: It is said that the world's five fluorescent lake, three in Puerto Rico! Imagine sitting kayak night sky star head, swing on the lake, this is how pleasant and romantic! Remember that the ship can not be called out, set aside some distance, a few knock pound boat, surrounded by plankton will gradually emits blue light, dare to be a little beauty! Culebra island: here compare the original ecosystem, delicate and clean beaches, the island people have full local characteristics, compared to San Juan, come here just to leave the territory of the United States, can definitely experience a different culture and customs. Cuisine: there is something called "Mo Feng Ge" raw food, with green horns plantains and garlic, roasted pig mashed together, stir in butter, garlic and spicy tomato sauce made from the protein-rich plus chicken, steak, lobster or crab, definitely worth a try! And we often drink a piña colada is the birthplace of San Juan, it has become a meal must drink! Other strange foods also never afraid to try it because of the strange Oh! Fee: Westjet outbound direct (as long as four and a half hours), Philadelphia backhaul transfer of about 800 knives; a variety of round-trip flights are required to transfer more than 100 knives are cheaper. Accommodation, if you want to enjoy resort level, the price is the price the United States (laughs), but also benefits the economy inn knife 100 a night. Yellowknife (Yellowknife): Yellowknife Yellowknife in the Northwest Territories of Canada, 400 kilometers from the Arctic Circle, is the world's most northern capital. See more North Aurora is not possible, only in the auroral zone (Aurora Oval) before we can see inside. Yellowknife is located in the middle of the auroral zone, and because of low rainfall, geological gentle, is that to watch Aurora Holy Land. The best time to watch the aurora for the annual September to March next year, the Reading Week free small partner wish to spend two or three days, feel Yellowknife style. Machine back and forth, then fly to almost 1,000 knife, you can choose accommodation hotel, inn, B & B, priced at around 40-60 knives. Preferably with shutter release or remote control, so good and precise control of exposure, but also reduce the vibration generated by the camera hand touch. title: 出国那么久，还不会煎牛扒？
author: UTADA旗下为多大学生提供便利的公众号
content: Abroad for so long, it will not fried steak? UT UT assistant assistant assistant 2015-01-18UT Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's multi-university students to facilitate public number coke crisp outside, tender, juicy steak color is ~! ! The method according to, you can also oh ~ 1. Put five minutes, you can save all the juice!  what! ? Bovine emissions than five minutes to eat hot juicy 500 times! Try not to believe, cures greedy impatient! 2. Olive oil and butter? Not fit for fried steak! Sunflower oil, rapeseed oil is more suitable for fried steak! Olive oil is only suitable for low-temperature cooking, hot frying destroys its nutrition. Fragrant butter, obscure steak taste, no flavor ingredients for the pursuit of connoisseurs. 3. You must use the fire! It will produce 100 kinds of meat! Do not be afraid charred meat, do not be afraid to burn the kitchen, make sure to boil smoke, the whole big steak gently. This is the legend of the Maillard reaction: high temperature so that the meat protein and sugar reactions, can produce more than 100 kinds of types of meat. 4.15 to 20 seconds to turn a face to the outside and tender inside! Thermal imaging cameras fried steak process, we will soon see the upward side cooling, however, every 15 seconds to turn it over to make the surface of the continuous high temperature, while the internal temperature is not too high, perfect preservation gravy. 5. To what thick steak! Home fried, 1-2.5cm enough at home, do not pursue only one pan thick flesh. Oven but can try 4cm thick steaks, each side are sealed with fire boiled for 30 seconds, and then put in the oven preheated 260 ℃, two bake for 2 minutes, respectively. 6. Do not wash the steak! Suction surface with kitchen paper about a piece of steak on the line can have dirty? You punch beef loose fibers to dilute the flavor of the beef, you use your obsessive exchange for a piece of steak sadness. 7. Steak with garlic slice to the aroma, this trick super owners! Raw garlic cut in half, wipe the meat raw steak, wok fried to a delicious can not be stopped. 8. Without salt? You'll regret it! Haiyan loaded to force is not used, it is used to enhance the steak layering! While touching the tongue have not had time to open large pieces of salt, while they encountered the kind of sense of it gradually melts unevenly opened the meat, the taste of beef mixed with constantly stimulate the taste buds! 9. Steak less than 20 ℃, do not hack! Just thaw good, or just out of the refrigerator interior steak only 3 ~ 4 ℃. Must first put 30 minutes, let the meat inside and outside to reach room temperature about 20 ℃, steak cooked quickly, do not lose too much juice, meat is not cooked outside endogenous. 10. You can also try green pepper thing - if the meat is not too fat, you can also try the flavor is more refreshing, more moderate spicy green pepper, black pepper is more than lean beef made of incense. But be sure to use freshly ground flavor is enough enough. 11. Most tender filet mignon, but the eye meat, T bone thin and more enjoyably tender can have both, is the biggest characteristic of filet, girls especially like to lose weight. But want to eat chewing, have to focus on red meat, T bone go. 12. You have a top steak? Then do not use the sauce! Do not spoil prime steaks with sauces, superfluous superfluous to say How about you. Using only sea salt and black pepper marinated on the line, good meat you deserve to play again back to nature. 13. Do not forget to fry meat fat you do not feel the edge of raw sirloin steak very embarrassing fat circle around it? Fry it stand up, the fat will be very crisp skin, lean meat and eat super fragrant. 14. Choose steak, do not just look to see snow in addition to the selection of steak is not the extent of snow (Marbling), but also is not a natural rosy flesh, fat color is white, fat thickness is not to make you satisfied. 15. What can save you, my M12 are a lot of people dream of M12, but most people eat when will feel very greasy. Really suitable for fry eat it? Really suitable for direct chunk eat it? Not everyone come to bear over the top, we believe M7 ~ 8 is the most perfect. 16. Not all have a serrated steak knife! Even blunt can cut, this is the truth serrated knife. In fact a good toothless like tofu steak knife from feeling Gengshuang! For a steak knife, the appearance of it is minor, it is the last word sharp. 17. Striped skillet is actually used to hold the force! Steak is the best way to open fire grill, grill but also a pretty hot streak! So there is this fringe skillet goods. In fact, the thick iron pan is enough, it can continue to provide a uniform ultra-high temperature, steak could have been on top of frantically burn! Oh! spray! Fragrant! 18. There is a steak approach called SousVide Sousvide mean low-temperature vacuum cooking. The steak marinated, vacuum packaging into the water below 80 ℃ for a long time to cook, and then come up quickly grilled. This would make the perfect steak: under the thin crispy crust, the meat is cooked 5-7 minutes, color uniformity is still fresh! Professional Sous vide cooking machine is very expensive, but if you're a food goods Geek, yourself DIY one is also good. After reading this 18 you really can PK a Michelin chef! Fried steak is not very easy? title: 【号外】撤资浪潮中的多大
author: 功能介绍
content: [Extra] wave of divestment 2015-10-31 how serious sexy little bastard UT Helper UT Helper UT assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's multi-university students to facilitate public number University of Toronto Students' Union (UTSU) on October 29 response Toronto350.org call, the school started a campaign for the withdrawal of fossil energy-related investment companies demonstrations. At the same time, worldwide on an unprecedented scale grand student movement has slowly begun. First of all, who is Toronto350? The Global Divestment Campaign global fossil fuel divestment movement initiated by 350.org. The name represents the concentration of carbon dioxide in the atmosphere, 350 PPM is a standard of human existence, and the current content of more than 390ppm, the name of this campaign is to let everyone know moving target. University of Toronto student how to make a statement? Brief summary, the purpose of the student movement of the University of Toronto requires that the withdrawal of fossil energy companies and investment shares. (The following is the official statement and translations for interested students to read reference) Fossil Fuel Divestment fossil fuel divestment movement The Canadian government and many others around the world recognize global warming of 2˚C as the threshold at which climate change will become dangerous. Decades of scientific research clearly demonstrate acorrelation between carbon dioxide (CO2) emissions into the atmosphere and the Earth's rapidly increasing surface temperature. Fossil fuel burning producesthe majority of carbon dioxide emissions caused by human activity. Currently, global fossil fuel reserves contain 2,795 gigatonnes of carbon dioxide; about five times what can be safely emitted into the atmosphere Governments around the world, including the Government of Canada will limit the risk of global warming climate change is set to 2˚C, beyond this temperature and a predetermined amount of change will sustainable human development. dangerous. In recent years, scientific studies continue to demonstrate that emissions of carbon dioxide in the atmosphere is closely related to the rapid increase in surface temperature. But also difficult to find human activities related to burning fossil fuels is the main source of carbon dioxide emissions. Now, 2.795 trillion of global fossil fuel reserves can emit five times the amount of carbon dioxide in danger. (170 students and stuff of U of T march for fossil fuel divestment) Students, staff and faculty at the University of Toronto have become involved in a global campaign for public institutions to divest from fossil fuels. We have endorsed a campaign led by Toronto 350 , which calls upon the University of Toronto to do the following: University of Toronto students, faculty and staff of public institutions in response to the worldwide fossil fuel divestment movement of the joint. We support and response-related sports Toronto350 and call for the University of Toronto to the following measures:. I Make an immediatestatement of principle expressing the school's intention to divest itsdirect holdings of stock in the 200 fossil-fuel companies from around the worldwith the largest reserves; immediately determined to make the statement, serious attitude about to divest its stake in 200 companies around the world's fossil energy; ii immediately stop makingnew investments in the industry;. to immediately stop its expansion of new industrial investment projects; iii Sell its direct holdingsin the. 200 companies over five years; five years for the sale of all the company's direct holding 200;.. iv sell its stock in Royal Dutch Shell within one year within one year of the sale of the related shares of Royal Dutch Shell. (170 students and stuff of U of T march for fossil fuel divestment) other universities institutions divestment dynamic in 2012, Harvard University Students' Union denounced the school as high as $ 30.7 billion investment in fossil energy, accusing it of promoting accelerated global climate warming, which initiate a referendum and get 72% of the rate of student support. UBC Student Union at the beginning of last year, with 77% voting in favor of the rate reduction of $ 1 billion school-related investment. In early July, the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change UNFCCC officially announced to join the "fossil fuel divestment movement" UNFCCC hopes to support fossil fuel divestment movement, thereby promoting this December's United Nations climate summit summit formed an efficient binding agreement. There are more than 180 cities worldwide, universities, public institutions supported from fossil fuel divestment movement. Discussion and criticism? (The following section is small tortoise personal views do not represent the position of the community) are not the wave of the divestment no precedent to follow. By divestment pressure to reach the ultimate goal of a world-class student movement, we can be traced back to the 1960's apartheid in South Africa divestment movement and the tobacco companies nineties divestment activities. But this time really on fossil energy company's divestment activities whether it can be compared with the previous two? From the perspective of content analysis divestment, contribution of fossil fuels to the development of human civilization has made absolutely positive. The question of apartheid in South Africa, as well as the negative impact of the nineties the tobacco industry has intuitively clear. From this point of view to discuss ways divestments by inciting student groups to put pressure on schools and major organizations to achieve the purpose of money, whether alone? Needless No, the game is not just a bargaining chip between the energy in various countries, but also is the cornerstone of the development of human civilization worldwide. Perhaps you will say, error-free energy, fossil wrong, after all, so many different sources of energy available. How about the truth? In recent years, new energy-related topics constantly, enduring to the exclusive forum, titillate our curiosity and expectations. However, another one a decade later, to explore with disappointments, there is no large-scale promotion may be able to replace fossil fuels and environmental energy appears. Solar energy, tidal energy, wind energy, geothermal energy, and even nuclear power, atomic energy, the energy is not unfamiliar vocabulary all over the streets, become our staple, it is only gossip. Not everyone is regaling casually, then it is possible to change the status quo, to solve problems, but also to heal or contradictions between various interest groups? If regaling may not, whether through the streets in protest, denouncing divestment is both a feasible way out? We are outraged, we are filled with blood, we have the responsibility to protect the planet, we no mistake, no fossil fuels are also wrong? And we need to stand in the perspective of a rational reflection behavior? Whether this is just a worldwide environmental action, or a difficult to reach international compromise, also, or incite students rally unilateral conspiracy? What do you think? Ultimately, the point of the Go Fossil Free campaigns is not just to put money where fossil fuel companies can not use it (they know they are not up to this $ 4.65 trillion challenge). It is to make public declarations that they don 't want to be associated with such industries. --Alice Bell (writer and researcher on science, technology, and the environment) the ultimate goal of "Go fossil Free campaigns" movement is not just the money transferred out of fossil energy companies (knowing this second movement only for the market value of 4.65 trillion US dollars in the energy industry chain breaks against), but to express to the public and related industries to draw the line of determination. This is a sweeping global fossil fuel divestment actions in the end will be what kind of impact the global environment? We'll see. Recalling the common global concern about climate change in the historical process (the following section for interested students to consult and read), "United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change" in May 1992 at United Nations Headquarters in New York by the (United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change, UNFCCC) The Convention there is no obligation on the specific needs of individual provisions of the Parties bear, nor provisions of enforcement mechanisms. In this sense, the lack of legally binding convention. However, the Convention provides for mandatory emission limits set in the subsequent dependent Protocol. "Kyoto Protocol to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change" in 1997 in Kyoto, Japan by (the "Kyoto Protocol") greenhouse gas emission reduction as a legal obligation of developed countries. 2007 13th General Assembly of the United Nations COP13 Climate Change (2007 United Nations Climate ChangeConference) held in Bali, Indonesia, more than 180 delegates and observers for intergovernmental and non-governmental organizations of countries participated in the meeting, adopted the Bali Roadmap. The new Protocol COP15 United Nations Climate Change Conference 2009 in Copenhagen, Denmark buddies held due between developed and developing views contradict abortion. "Copenhagen Protocol" is mainly on carbon dioxide emissions from various countries, the signing of the Protocol to reduce carbon dioxide emissions according to each country's GDP. December 8, 2012, held in Qatar COP18 (the 18th United Nations General Assembly on Climate Change) on the Kyoto Protocol in 2012 should be agreed to extend the maturity to 2020. Http://www.xyfunds.com.cn/info.dohscontentid=102212.htm2 350.org global environmental movement | http://www.ynxxb.com/content . / 2013-11 / 12 / N121877666193 350.org - What We Do |. http://350.org/about/what-we-do/4 five things to let you know fossil fuel divestment | Alice • Alice Bell Bell --ROADTOPARIS <Fossil Free? Five things you need to know about divestment campaigns> http://roadtoparis.info/2014/10/13/go-fossil-free-five-things-need-know-divestment-campaigns/ Go5 Fossil Fuel Divestment | University of Toronto Students' Union | http://utsu.ca/fossil-fuel-divestment/ little bastard: a sexy yet serious new small series is like to advertise community. title: 别点开这篇 ｜科学用网指南
author: UTzhushou
content: Do not point to open this | net guide scientific originality 2016-08-18ArieUT assistant UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's multi-university students to facilitate the public but also to the number of annual summer season after returning, carries unable press resistant excitement, safe home. But the fly in the ointment thing, like a Yin Ji, relapse under specified conditions, is so restless people. How to describe ways to solve the problem can not be described? This article will taught you how to "anytime, anywhere with google". I returned home, ready to pick up the half-done project, see page there is this like this: most can not tolerate, programmers god --Stack Overflow, has become such: "Stack Overflow requires external JavaScript from another domain, which is blocked or failed to load "there are many similar situations, such as just want to pay a tuition fee, Scotiabank landed a full 15 minutes. So this can only sense the article, was born. Encountered such a problem can not be described, how to solve it? Surely you little expert who has his own method. Here we compiled some of the most common "no barrier net" approach. Solution 1 using readily available proxy server principle: The English name is a proxy server (Proxy Server), whose function is to proxy network users to obtain network information. Is simply between the user and the site you want to access the establishment of an intermediate layer, users can access the web page (fan qiang) want to access through the intermediate layer. Specifically: There are many online sites offer web proxy, we can set the proxy ip directly in the browser, but most are not stable enough, the need for frequent manual configuration is too much trouble, here recommend a good use of chrome free browser plug-in that automatically help the user to switch proxy: proxy for chrome after the installation click "on" science can get online! Summary: Advantages: convenient, mostly for free. Cons: First thing to say is a security issue, we can not guarantee the security of online search to the proxy server. Some malicious proxy will steal user account password even browsing history information, so remember not to pay tuition by proxy proxy. Secondly, most of the Internet is readily available proxy http / SOCKS proxy, meaning that only a partial wall. Let's say only access google browser, if you want to call google map in your app in the api to do nothing. Workaround 2 Use VPN principle: VPN stands for Virtual Private Network. In simple terms, the birth of the beginning of the VPN is to allow external network access to internal company network using, VPN do is set up a user channel connection and VPN servers, different from the proxy, this is absolutely encrypted channel, others can see only you connect the VPN, nothing else. Including your IP address and access records are strictly encrypted. Specifically: VPN mostly paid, but evil Baidu search search to VPN almost does not work, not slow, just do not support mac. After the author of numerous failed attempts, here recommend a Baidu search less but the company located in the United States VPN established companies: express VPN (for the avoidance of advertising too here not posted links) I use it to watch youtube and no Caton very moved. (Supplement a professional evaluation website vpndada.com) Summary: Pros: stable, safe and customer support. There is a VPN is a global agency, do not worry you can not call the situation google map api like. Disadvantages: a month more than a dozen knives, little expensive, the peak period will slow down. Solution 3 build your own proxy server (using AWS EC2) principle: If you do not meet the above two methods, or security still have doubts, here is a slightly higher threshold slightly more expensive but also very fun Solutions - - build your own proxy server. The specific measures Summary: Tinyproxy installed in their own Amazon ec2 server, set the proxy server address in the browser. There is provided a very detailed article, limited space we can learn on their own after school ADA community will have a corresponding workshop taught you build your own proxy. http://www.frankhq.io/blog/2012/11/14/how-to-setup-a-private-proxy-server-on-ec2-in-under-10-minutes/ advantages: absolute security, stability , a sense of accomplishment disadvantages: expensive, Amazon metered month could easily use more than 50 knife. A thousand words merged into one sentence: no barrier is good, fan qiang need to be cautious. The current tutorial here, I wish you all a happy eating. author: UTzhushou
content: Apple users please note: you must know the original event 2015-09-19 XcodeGhost negative mirror assistant UT UT UT assistant assistant Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA's multi-university students to facilitate public numbers this morning burst of XcodeGhost event called " since the App Store on-line in 2008 suffered the largest attack, "I believe we have heard already, then this attack is how it all about? I was affected by it? How should we respond? On from the author briefly explain: First of all, what is a problem? Many domestic app on your Apple phone, including, but not limited to: Netease cloud music, Didi taxi, 12306, CITIC Bank move card space, China Unicom, high moral map, Jane books, pea pods eyes open, Netease open class, the kitchen, 51 cards safe, flush, Lifesmart, Mala Mala, medicine to the force, the Himalayas, pocket billing, micro-channel 6.2.5, watercress reading, SuperMii, CamScanner, the kitchen. . . . Then, what is the harm? In simple terms, there are two hazards: disclosure of personal information and a malicious remote control of an infected app uploads basic user information to a hacker server. Hackers could remotely operate the phone popups require users to enter a password; hacker could remotely call system or other program services, remote installation without the app store audit program, and jumps between programs remotely; call within purchase. Therefore, the following is likely to occur: The mobile phone users are playing and singing, suddenly pop-up window: "! Our test version of the software particularly useful new features yo" user points to open install new software, and new software login account theft. Or: the mobile phone user is playing and singing, suddenly pop-up window: "XX available in your purchase fails refunded to re-purchase it?" User to re-purchase, enter apple id, password, and apple id theft, iCloud leak in the nude (crossed out), credit card theft brush. However, this kind of thing how could it? I drew a diagram to explain: So, how should I respond? First, upgrade to the latest version of all software; secondly, if the most recent input apple id / password change operation is preferably password; Finally, please be careful to deal with the purchase of the operating software installed / internal; so, who will recite this the pot? Currently we do not know who initiated the attack, but the prime suspect is a coderfun called the id. Domestic app developers to use non-standard development tools, is one of the main reasons of the attack. Apple audits poor, blame. title: 老和开讲 | 美国大选伊始
author: UTzhushou
content: Old and lecture | 2016-07-24 old American election at the beginning of the original UT and UT assistant assistant assistant UT Micro Signal UTzhushou Features UTADA facilitate public's number is known as a multi-university students in 2016 US presidential election year. As the world's economic and military are ranked first in the "Uncle Sam," America's every move has a global impact, it can be described as indeed affect the whole body. As a dual national heads of the US government and the US President on behalf of not only the US government policy, but also shoulder the responsibility of the United States on behalf of the country's image. Today, the old and the young assistant with everyone understand the US presidential election process, and the specific circumstances of this election. Bi-partisan politics, political parties and the US government since the beginning of 1853 and the left-wing Democratic alternation of power by the right wing of the Republican Party. Although sometimes the case a party re-election, but overall both parties shift, the leading position. On economic policy, the Republicans praised the "small government, big capital." That is usually a Republican administration will propose to cut taxes, abolish government control, reduce government spending policies. Overall, the economy this thing threw Adam Smith's "invisible hand" like, blind government intervention will only be a disservice. Republicans tend to conservatism on social values. Fresh ideas, fresh trend in the Republican Party will take some time to be accepted, such as homosexuality, marijuana legalization, affirmative action, gun control and the like. Can be said that the Republican ideology of progress "brake." The Democratic Party can be said that the Republican Party opposite. Philosophy in all economic, cultural, political and Republicans are singing a different tune. The Democratic Party's position is "the people's voice", which represents the interests of the middle class to the bottom of society, to promote "big government to take care of people." That is to increase government spending in order to provide social benefits, such as universal health care. Large consortia Democrats hold a conservative attitude that they must be subject to government regulation that would make a negative impact on society (see the Wall Street crash in 2008). Democrats "Three Views" more progress, promote social values ​​of secularism, liberalism, equal rights and so on. These values ​​will also be placed on the traditional Democratic Party "privileged" class opposites, for example, a "rich man Christian" is a relatively small chance of Democratic supporters. Every four years, the United States will hold a general election. Although the basic long as they can gasp children of US citizens can stand for election, but if the two parties came not elected microcredit almost minimal. So people first concern is a party elections in the United States before the November election ushered in the first, called "primary election". After winning two party candidates then represent their party and fight political opponents, try to win the general election in November (general election). 2016 Primary Election in the Primary Election, the candidates started fighting in every US state and territory. Within each state votes will be obtained as a candidate to win "on behalf of" (delegates), to give delegates maximum number of candidates to obtain the party nomination. Since the incumbent president two black. . . Ah is not Barack Obama, the Democratic Party, the Republican regime changed hands to the chance of a relatively large, after all, the Democratic Party has been re-elected for eight years. This year's Republican elite like to play with blood, like have election, the first time the debate within the party as much as 10 participants. Which it is generally considered promising, including former President George W. Bush's younger brother little Bush, Texas Sen. Ted Cruz, Florida Senator Marco Rubio, as well as business people Donald Trump. (When they introduce themselves during the debate I often in two's complement their brain like a contest. "Foshan, Ip Man", Texas, Cruz. Well, the hole is too small make the brain.) Compared to the Democratic side under less lively debate for the first time only five candidates, and generally regarded as promising, only one former secretary of state Hillary Clinton. Bernie Sanders is the end of 2015, blaze a dark horse, within a few months tied the huge gap between the polls and Clinton 60 percent. Bernie Sanders with absolute transparency and external attitude dare to challenge traditional authority, won the support of a large number of Democrats and independents. In February the first state, Iowa Primary with Hillary difference of 0.2%. So the Democratic Party since the beginning of February became a duel of two people, the other three all withdraw from the election. Unfortunately, a huge grassroots movement Sanders is still no match for the huge Democratic Party political machine behind Hillary Clinton, the last 46% of the vote defeat. One hand, traditional Republican voters for Republican candidates sophisticate who have lost appetite, bowl Xingsao Douzhi children cheer children are looking for solutions. Little Bush, Rubio such conventional candidates throughout poll rate did not reach more than 20%. In contrast Donald Trump in the polls all the way up, thrown over Cruz, Rubio, Kasich and other number one horse. To March, seven candidates will withdraw from the election, leaving only Trump, Cruz, and Kasich. In this way, Donald Trump finally with "America first" attitude, people outside the party's position, as well as hawkish stance has won the vote of the majority of Republican voters. He won 41 games in 56 states in the primaries. Looking to the November general election candidates of both parties have now qualify, can the situation remains uncertain. Now, if someone tells you he who was elected this year to determine that he is either stupid, or just lie to you. Writing in small series, while the gap between Clinton and polls Trump was 2.7%, within the error range. In recent months, terrorist attacks have occurred, Trump fear green, anti-immigrant and exclusive policy will increasingly be accepted. Trump supporters generally low level of education, 60% of the Trump supporters never went to college. Precisely because of this, although not withstand the scrutiny of his remarks can be welcomed in these people. Hillary Clinton is taking the "natural" route, that she votes the most powerful lines is "You do not choose who you vote for me ah." In a very long period of time, this mode is feasible. Since 1993, her children home near Bill Clinton became president, she would walk into the people's attention, visibility plays an important role in the election. Bernie Sanders now officially "porcelain capital" Hillary, she hopes to be able to split before the primary election of Democratic voters to unite once again, to the "I'm not Trump" route to win more people to vote. Finally, to say there is a little a little in this election should be concerned about, and that is Libertarian Party Gary Johnson. Since Hillary and the party Trump's support rate is not high, many people are looking for a third possibility. Gary Johnson is also like to seize this opportunity to continue to hope to get on the American political scene. After winning the Libertarian Party nomination after his speech he stated that "this year, although when the president is unlikely, but the presidential debates should still let me go now." While it sounds pathetic, but this is a golden opportunity for sight into the unknown for the Libertarian Party. About all the summer school, small partners are not clear on all of it? Important Dates ArtSci / Architecture March 29, enrolment start time appears on the ROSI. enrolment start time when everyone is April 5th time may begin to enroll their courses. The start time is the total number of credits each student to be completed in June this year to decide, in general, the more credits start time more front. April 5, to ROSI elective. To their start time, please enjoy to ROSI election (qiang) Division (ke) it - but please note that if a lesson enrollment indicator inside P, then this class time in April 5th only on opening up priority groups of students. April 12 6:00 am, Toronto time, P is canceled. After a enrolment control of P to be canceled. No priority students choose these courses can also be friends, be sure not to sleep late, oh! April 28, payment deadline. Payment is a step summer school registration, if the April 28 registration has not been completed, then the school reserves the right to move students out of the class selected from inside. Engineering April 11 at 6 am, beginning on ROSI Course, this time can only choose engineering courses. April 18 at 6 am, began the election art & science curriculum. Art & science courses open, engineering students can begin to select the art & science courses. April 28, the deadline for contributions. The deadline to pay the money to complete the summer school registration. Payment contribution is a step summer school registration, and later grabbed the lesson, each student ROSI will appear above the corresponding invoice, paid in full before long as the deadline (April 28) on it. All students after registration is complete, registration status on the inside ROSI 2016 summer will be from [Invited] into [Registered]. Summer school's timetable and Fall / Winter term of substantially the same timetable, should be noted, summer school's section and usually are not the same. First, summer school two term, namely first term (May 9 - 6 March 24) and the second term (June 27 - 8 15 May). In the timetable, there is a section, this section is used to represent this class of instruction time period. 2016 Summer school a total of three section: F (first term): May 9 - June 24, exam period: June 20 - June 24 S (second term): June 27 - August 15, exam period: August 9 - August 15 Y (first and second terms): May 9 - August 15, exam period: August 9 - August 15 school in summer , there are some 0.5 points course section code is Y (for example, all classes CSC), meaning that on a four-month course, but only get 0.5 credits.
